atra kaustubha bimba adharayoḥ gamyate iti artha śakti malaḥ laṅkāra dhvaniḥ
ubhaya śakti mūlaḥ yathā
ṇa ramai tahā

original: śabdapratītipuraḥsarīkāreṇārthapratītiriti prathamaṃ śabdagata eva dharmanirdeśo nyāyyo nārthagata ityāśaṅkyāha-arthetyādi /

yathā

a praruḍham punar alaṅkāraḥ

start sūtra
āmukha avabhāsanam punar punar ukta vat ābhāsam
āmukha grahaṇam paryavasāne nyathātva pratipatti artham
lakṣya nirdeśe na āpuṃsakaḥ saṃskāraḥ laukika alaṅkāra vaidharyeṇa kāvya alaṅkāraṇām alaṅkāryam pāratantrya dhvanana arthaḥ
artha paunaruktyāt eva arthī īśrita tvāt arthālaṅkāra tvam jñeyam

original: nanu punaruktavadābhāsaśabdasyālaṅkāraśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādupamādivadajahalliṅgatvayogācca puṃlliṅgatve kimitīha nāpuṃsakaḥ saṃskāraḥ kṛta  #

iti āśaṅkya āha lakṣya ityādi

original: lakṣyasya lakṣaṇīyasya punaruktavadābhāsasya punaḥśabdāpekṣayā nirdeśo vacanamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣyasya lakṣaṇīyasya punar ukta vat ābhāsasya punar śabda apekṣayā nirdeśaḥ vacanam iti arthaḥ
alaṅkārya pāratantrā iti
kāvya sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdeśāt
laukikāḥ hāra ādayaḥ
eṣām hi alaṅkāryeṇa saha saṃyogaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
atas eva eṣām tad paratantra tā api na syāt
kāvya alaṅkārāṇām punar alaṅkāryeṇa saha samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ
atas eva eṣām ayuta siddha tvāt alaṅkārya pāratantryam eva iti laikika alaṅkāra vaidharmyam eva nyāyyam
āśraya āśrayi bhāvena alaṅkārya alaṅkaraṇa bhāva upapatteḥ kimāśrayam asya alaṅkāra tvam iti āśaṅkāya āha artha ityādi
eva kāraḥ śabda paunaruktya avaccheda dyotakaḥ
tena śabdasya apaunaruktyāt na śabda alaṅkāraḥ na api ubhaya alaṅkāraḥ yam iti arthaḥ

original: paryavasāne vastutor'thasyāsattvāt dharmyaṃbhāve ca dharmaṃsya nirviṣayatvātpaunaruktyaṃ kasya dharmaḥ syāditi na vācyam /
analyzed: paryavasāne vastutas ūrthasya asattvāt dharmyaṃbhāve ca dharmaṃsya nirviṣaya tvāt paunaruktyam kasya dharmaḥ syāt iti na vācyam
āmukha irthasya avabhāsamāna tvena sattvāt dharmi dharma bhāvasya na eva aniṣṭeḥ artha gatayoḥ sattva asattvayoḥ anupayogāt
āmukha avagatā eva ca pratītiḥ alaṅkāra bījam na pāryavasānikī
tathātve hi upamā rūpaka ādīnām api aviśeṣaḥ syāt
paryavasāne pi arthasya dāruṇaḥ kāṣṭataḥ jātaḥ ityādau indhana arthasya sattvāt anaikāntika tva abhāvāt śraśaśṛ vat abhāvaḥ na vācyaḥ

original: paryavasāne 'pyatrandhanārthaḥ sannapi nālaṅkāratvaprayojaka iti 'arivadhadehaśarīraḥ' [kāvya prakāśa 91389]ityādāpyasatā kāyārthenāviśeṣātsamānaḥ
analyzed: paryavasāne san api na alaṅkāra tva prayojakaḥ iti ari vadha deha śarīraḥ kāvya prakāśa kāya arthena aviśeṣāt samānaḥ
kim vaḥ itas na paryavasāna īrthasya a sattvam

original: iha hi pratītimātrasāratvātkavyasya yadyathaiva pratīyate tattathaiva bhavatītyāvivādaḥ /
analyzed: iha hi pratīti mātra sāra tvāt kavyasya yat yathā eva pratīyate tat tathā eva bhavati iti avivādaḥ
tad vādha utpattau api taimirika dvi candra pratīti vat punarukta tayā avabhātasya arthasya avabhāsamāna tvāt sattvam eva
nahi śataśīpi krūra ādi artha upalambhe kāṣṭha ādeḥ arthasya apunarukta tayā bhānam asti
bādhā utpatteḥ punar dvi candra pratīti vat paunaruktya pratīteḥ anupapadyamāna tvam bhavati
na tu śuktikāyām iva rajata pratyayasya svarūpataḥ eva abhāvaḥ
atas eva ābhāta paunaruktyā api pratītiḥ apaunaruktya paryavasāyinī asya svarūpam
evam api vastutas kāya ādi artha abhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ iti ced satyam

original: kiṃ tu tathā vastuto bahirasaṃbhavannapi dvitīyaścandraḥ pratītau kañcana viśeṣamādhātuṃ
analyzed: kim tu tathā vastutas bahis asaṃbhavan api dvitīyaḥ candraḥ pratītau kañcana viśeṣam ādhātum

original: notsahate tathehāpi vastuvṛttena kāyāderthasyāsaṃbhave 'pi pratītau na kaścidviśeṣa
analyzed: nā utsahate tathā iha api vastu vṛttena kāya ādeḥ thasya asaṃbhave pratītau na kaścid viśeṣa
iti diṇḍikā rāgaḥ eva vāstava tva anveṣaṇam
tasmāt atra avabhāsamāna tvam eva arthasya sattva pratīṣṭhāpakam pramāṇam

original: nanu avabhāsamānatvaṃ pramātṛdharma iti kathaṃ tadāśrayo dharmaḥ kāvyālaṅkāra iti cet, asadetat /
analyzed: nanu avabhāsamāna tvam pramātṛ dharmaḥ iti katham tad āśrayaḥ dharmaḥ kāvyālaṅkāre iti ced asat etat
avabhāsamāna tvasya avabhāsya niṣṭa tayā pratīteḥ artha dharma tvāt
tathā hi keṣāṃcana pratītivādinām
tathā hi vedya tā nāma bhāvasya eva nijam vapuḥ

original: caitreṇa vedyaṃ vedmīti kiṃ hyatra pratibhāsate' //
analyzed: caitreṇa vedyam vedmi iti kim hi atra pratibhāsate
ityādi ukta yuktyā kaumārila vat nīla tayā iva vedya tāyāḥ api artha dharma tva bhās iṣṭam

original: iha ca tadupakrama eveti na vastuvādasaṃsparśo nyāyyaḥ /
analyzed: iha ca tad upakramaḥ eva iti na vastuvāda saṃsparśaḥ nyāyyaḥ

original: āmukhatulyārthatvasya ca śabdadharmatvena śabdāśrayatvāt śabdālaṅkāratvaṃ yadyasyocyate
analyzed: āmukha tulya artha tvasya ca śabda dharma tvena śabda āśraya tvāt śabda alaṅkāra tvam yat yasya ucyate

original: tathāpi paryavasāne vastutastulyārthatvasyāsaṃbhavāt śaśaśṛṅgavaddharmadharmibhāvo duṣṭaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tathā api paryavasāne vastutas tulya ārthatvasya asaṃbhavāt śaśa śṛṅga vat dharma dharmi bhāvaḥ duṣṭaḥ syāt
sattve pi doṣaḥ evā iti asmad pakṣa ukta samagra codya avakāśaḥ
atra api yadi āmukhaḥ eva ekārtha tvena avabhāsanam samādhiḥ tadā asmad pakṣeṇa kim aparāddham

original: evaṃ ca virodhe 'pi vastuto viruddhasyāsaṃbhavādviruddhārthatvasya ca śabdadharmatvāt śabdālaṅkāratvaṃ prasajyate /
analyzed: evam ca virodhe vastutas viruddhasya asaṃbhavāt viruddha artha tvasya ca śabda dharma tvāt śabda alaṅkāra tvam prasajyate
atra viruddhasya arthasya asaṃbhave api kartṛ ādibhiḥ vācya tayā adhyavasāyaḥ

original: iha tu paunaruktyāśrayasyānanvitatvena na vācyateti cet,
analyzed: iha tu paunaruktya āśrayasya ananvita tvena na vācya tā iti ced
na etat

original: yataḥ 'dāruṇaḥ kāṣṭato jātaḥ' ityādau tāvatpaunaruktyāśrayasya kāṣṭāderarthasya jātatvādinā sahānavitatvāvagamādastyeva mukhyayā vṛttyā vācyatvam
analyzed: yatas dāruṇaḥ kāṣṭataḥ jātaḥ ityādau tāvat paunaruktya āśrayasya kāṣṭa ādeḥ arthasya jāta tva ādinā saha anavita tva avagamāt asti eva mukhyayā vṛttyā vācyatvam

original: 'arivadhadehaśarīraḥ' ityādau tu vastutaḥ kāyāderavācye 'pyavabhātapaunaruktyāśrayatvādakṛtrimārthaśobhāparyāvasāyi tvena vācyatayāstyeva vivakṣitatvam
analyzed: ari vadha deha śarīraḥ ityādau tu vastutas kāya ādeḥ avācye tvena vācyatayā asti eva vivakṣita tvam

original: atra jhakṛtrimor'tho 'laṅkṛtakṛtrimārthopaskṛto yathā camatkārakṛt na tathā tadupaskṛtayocyamānaḥ syāt /
analyzed: atra laṅkṛta kṛtrima artha upaskṛtaḥ yathā camatkāra kṛt na tathā tad upaskṛtayā ucyamānaḥ syāt

original: 'strīṇāṃ hi kaṇṭhābharaṇāni hārāḥ payodharānapyabhibhūṣayanti' ityādidṛśā ca hārasya
analyzed: strīṇām hi kaṇṭha ābharaṇāni hārāḥ payodharān api abhibhūṣayanti iti ādi dṛśā ca hārasya
kaṇṭha alaṅkāra tve pi sāmīpyāt tau ati śobhā atiśaya ādhāyaka tvāt yathā payodhara ādau api alaṅkāra tvam
tathā eva kṛtrima artha āśraya tve pi avabhāsamānasya paunaruktasya akṛtrima artha upaskāraka tvam api
pratīyate eva iti na anubhaghava apahnavaḥ kāryaḥ

original: evaṃ ca paunaruktyāśrayasyārthasya yatraiva vāttyatvena vivakṣitatvaṃ tatraivāsyālaṅkāratvaṃ nānyatra /
analyzed: evam ca paunaruktya āśrayasya arthasya yatra eva vāttya tvena vivakṣita tvam tatra eva asya alaṅkāra tvam na anyatra
iyam vilāsinī kasya na netra utsava kāriṇī
atra akṛṣṇatī artha paunaruktyasya saṃbhave pi vācya tvena avivakṣita tvāt na ayam alaṅkāraḥ

original: evaṃ vakṣyamāṇānāmapyalaṅkārāṇāṃ kavivivakṣaiva svarūpapratiṣṭhāpakaṃ pramāṇaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: evam vakṣyamāṇānām api alaṅkārāṇām kavi vivakṣā eva svarūpa pratiṣṭhāpakam pramāṇam jñeyam
kim bahunā sarveṣām api alaṅkārāṇām upamita artha tva ādeḥ śabda dharma tvāt śabda alaṅkāra tvam syāt
tad artha alaṅkāra tvam asya jyāyaḥ
yāvatā hi arthasya amukhe eva punarukta tayā avabhāsaḥ sya jīvitam
atas eva punar ukta vat ābhāsam iti anvartha saṃgha jñā
arthasya ca paunaruktya pratītau na kasyacid vivādaḥ
tām eva āśrittaye śabdālaṅkārasya bhavadbhiḥ ukta tvāt
evam ca pratyāsatteḥ tad āśraya tvam eva asya alaṅkāra tvam yuktam

original: anyathā tulyārthaśabdatāpi vākyadharmaṃ iti tadāśrayo 'pi syādityanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ / @--------------------
analyzed: anyathā tulya artha śabda tā api vākya dharmam iti syāt iti anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ

uta punarukta artham vāci tvam

punar ukta vat ābhāsam iti anvartha saṃjñā āśrayaṇāt

original: ataścāyaṃ prāyo vākyārthapadārthāśrayatvātprathamaṃ dvidhābhavan samastāsamastapadatvena caturvidhaḥ /

original: anirdeśapakṣe cāsya na vaicitryaṃ kiñciditi na tadāśrayaṃ bhedajātamuktam /
analyzed: anirdeśa pakṣe ca asya na vaicitryam kiñcid iti na tad āśrayam bheda jātam uktam

original: ataścātra nirdiṣṭaḥ sādhāraṇadharmo vyavasthita iti kā nāma caturthaprakārakalpanā /
analyzed: atas ca atra nirdiṣṭaḥ sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ vyavasthitaḥ iti kā nāma caturtha prakāra kalpanā
vākya artha upamā gandhaḥ pi atra na asti

original: sa hyanekeṣāṃ dharmiṇāṃ parasparāvacchinnānāṃ tādṛśereva dharmibhiḥ sāmye bhavati /

yathā
janayicyāḥ kulālyāḥ ca rakṣitryāḥ viditaḥ bhayam
ratna sūteḥ bhujaṅgyāḥ ca pracchannaḥ iva śevadhiḥ
atra janayitrī ādīnām ratna sūti ādīni upamānāni upāttāni
eteṣām dharmi tvam ca sphuṭam eva
bimba pratibimba bhāvaḥ punar dharmi viśeṣa pratipādana unmukhānām dharmāṇām bhavati
atra hi hāra aṅgarāgayoḥ pāṇḍyasya viśiṣṭa tā āpādanāya eva upādānam
indumatīm prati tasya viśiṣṭa ālambana vibhāva tvena vivakṣita tvāt
atas ca tayoḥ paraspara unmukha tvāt sva ātmani evā aviśrāntiḥ iti kā kathā upameya tāyāḥ
evam hāra nirjhara ādi dharma nimittā eva upamā
tāvat mātreṇa eva sādṛśya paryavasānāt
tat ca hāra ādeḥ sādhāraṇa dharmasya bimba pratibimba tvāt dṛṣṭānta nyāyasya etat sūdāharaṇam eva
nanu hāra nirjharayoḥ tad a tad gāmi tva abhāvāt katham sādhāraṇa dharma tā iti ced
ucyate asyāḥ tāvat dharmasya sādhāraṇyam jīvitam
tat ca dharmasya eka tve bhavati
na ca vastutas tra dharmasya eka tvam

original: nahi ya eva mukhagato lāvaṇyādirdharmaḥ sa eva candrādau,
analyzed: nahi yaḥ eva mukha gataḥ lāvaṇya ādiḥ dharmaḥ saḥ eva candra ādau
tasya anvaya asaṃbhavāt
api tu tad jātīyaḥ sti dharmaḥ
evam dharmayoḥ bhedāt sādhāraṇa tva abhāvāt upamāyāḥ sva rūpa niṣpattiḥ eva na syāt
atha dharmayoḥ api sādṛśyam abhyupagamyate tat tatra api sādṛśya nimittam anyat anveṣyam
tatra api anyat iti anavasthā syāt
tatas ca dharmayoḥ vastutas bhede pi pratītau ekatā avasāyāt bhede pi abhedaḥ iti etad nimittam ekatvam āśrayaṇīyam
anyathā hi apamāyāḥ utthānam eva na syāt

original: ataśca śleṣa evātrālaṅkāro na paramparitaṃ rūpakamityatra tātparyam /
analyzed: atas ca śleṣaḥ eva atra alaṅkāraḥ na paramparitam rūpakam iti atra tātparyam
cintyam ca etat
yatas śleṣaḥ tāvat vāccayoḥ dvayoḥ prakṛtayoḥ aprakṛtayoḥ prakṛta aprakṛtayoḥ ca bhavati

original: atra ca na dvayoḥ prakṛtatvaṃ nāpyaprakṛtatvam /
analyzed: atra ca na dvayoḥ prakṛta tvam na api aprakṛta tvam
varṣā samaye jaladasya iva jalasya varṇanīya tvāt

original: prakṛtāprakṛtayośca viśeṣaṇasāmya eva śleṣo bhavati iha tu viśeṣyasyāpi sāmyamiti śabdaśaktyutthitasya dhvanerayaṃ viṣayo na śleṣasya /
analyzed: prakṛta aprakṛtayoḥ ca viśeṣaṇa sāmye eva śleṣaḥ bhavati iha tu viśeṣyasya api sāmyam iti śabda śakti utthitasya dhvaneḥ ayam viṣayaḥ na śleṣasya
atas ca na atra śleṣa alaṅkāraḥ
na api dhvaniḥ
jalada bhuja gajam iti rūpaka māhātmyāt śabda śakyā garala arthasya abhidhānāt

original: evamatra śliṣṭaśabdanibandhanaṃ [rūpakamevālaṅkāraḥ] jaladabhujagajamiti rūpakāntareṇāpi garalārtho yadi pratīyate tatsa dhvanervaṣayaḥ syādityuktaṃm
analyzed: evam atra śliṣṭa śabda nibandhanam rūpakam eva alaṅkāraḥ jalada bhuja gajam iti rūpaka antareṇa api garala arthaḥ yadi pratīyate tat sa dhvaneḥ vaṣayaḥ syāt iti uktam

original: sthite tu jaladabhujagajamiti rūpake tanmāhātmyādeva viṣaśabde śliṣṭaśabdanibandhanaṃ rūpakam /
analyzed: sthite tu jalada bhuja gajam iti rūpake tad māhātmyāt eva viṣa śabde śliṣṭa śabda nibandhanam rūpakam

original: anyathā hi jaladabhujagajamiti rūpakaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā hi jalada bhuja gajam iti rūpakam vyartham syāt

original: tena vinā hi garalārthaḥ pratīyatata ityalaṃ bahunā /
analyzed: tena vinā hi garala arthaḥ iti alam bahunā
start sūtra
āropyamāṇasya prakṛta upayogi tve pariṇāmaḥ

original: āropyamāṇaṃ rūpake prakṛtopayogitvābhāvātprakṛtoparañjakatvenaiva kevalenānvayaṃ bhajate pariṇāme tu prakṛtātmatayā āropyamāṇasyopayoga iti  #
analyzed: āropyamāṇam rūpake prakṛta upayogi tva abhāvāt prakṛta uparañjaka tvena eva kevalena anvayam bhajate pariṇāme tu prakṛta ātma tayā āropyamāṇasya upayogaḥ iti
prakṛtam āropyamāṇa rūpa tvena pariṇamiti
āgama anugama vigama khyāti abhāvāt sāṃkhyīya pariṇāma vaisakṣaṇyam
tasya sāmānādhikaraṇya vaiyadhikaraṇya prayogāt dvaividhyam
ādyaḥ yathā
tīḥ vā bhūteśa mauliḥ trajam amaradhunīm ātmanā asau tṛtīyaḥ tasmai saumitri maitrīm ayam upahṛtavān ātaram nāvikāya

original: vyāmagrāhyastanībhiḥ śabarayuvatibhiḥ kautukodañcadakṣaṃ kṛcchrādanvīyamānastvaritamaya giriṃ citrakūṭaṃ pratasthe' //
analyzed: vyāma grāhya stanībhiḥ śabara yuvatibhiḥ kautuka udañca dakṣam kṛcchrāt anvīyamānaḥ tvaritamaya girim citrakūṭam pratasthe
atra saumittri maittrī prakṛtā āropyamāṇa samāna adhikaraṇa atara rūpa tvena pariṇatā
ātarasya maittrī rūpa tayā prakṛte upayogāt

original: tadatra yathā samāsoktāvāronyamāṇaṃ prakṛtopayogi taccāropaviṣayātmatayā tatra sthitam,
analyzed: tat atra yathā samāsoktau āronyamāṇam prakṛta upayogi tat ca āropa viṣaya ātma tayā tatra sthitam

original: ata eva tatra tadvyavahārasamāropaḥ evamihāpi jñeyam,
analyzed: atas eva tatra tad vyavahāra samāropaḥ evam iha api jñeyam
kevalam tatra viṣayasya eva prayogaḥ
viṣayiṇaḥ gamyamāna tvāt
iha tu dvayoḥ api abhidhānam
tādātmyāt tu tayoḥ pariṇāmi tvam
dvitīyaḥ yathā
atha paktrimatām upeyivadbhiḥ sa rasaiḥ vakra patha āśritaiḥ vacobhiḥ
kṣitibhartuḥ upāyānam cakāra prathamam tat paratas turaṅgama ādyaiḥ
rāja saṃghaṭane tu upāyanam ucitam
tat ca atra vacaḥ rūpam iti vacasām vyadhikaraṇa upāyana rūpa tvena pariṇāmaḥ
āropyamāṇasya ityādi
āropya āropa viṣaya bhāva sāmye pi rūpakāt vailakṣaṇyam darśayan etat eva vyācaṣṭe āropyamāṇam ityādinā
prakṛta uparañjaka tvena iti
yat uktam viṣayiṇā viṣayasya rūpavataḥ kāraṇāt rūpakam iti
prakṛta ātma tayā iti
prakṛta aṅgatayā iti arthaḥ
upayogaḥ iti
tena vinā prakṛta arthasya aniṣpatteḥ
pariṇamati iti
prakṛtam aprakṛta vyavahāra viśiṣṭa tayā avatiṣṭate
prakṛta svarūpa mātra avasthāne prakaraṇa artha aniṣpatteḥ
evam atra prakaraṇa upayogi tva abhāvāt iti āropyamāṇasya upayogaḥ iti ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām prakṛta upayogi tvasya asādhāraṇa tvam darśitam
asādhāraṇa tvasya hi dharmasya tad tad vyavasthāpaka tvāt lakṣaṇa tvam
atas ca na asti eva alaṅkāra antareṣu prakṛta yogitvam
evam
āśāsyam anyat punar ukta bhūtam śreyāṃsi sarvāṇi adhijagmuṣaḥ te
putram labhasva ātma guṇa anurūpam bhavantam īḍyam bhavataḥ pitā iva
iti atra upamāyām
atrā antare sarasvatī avataraṇa vārtām iva kathayitum avatatāra madhyamam lokam aṃśumālī ityādau utprekṣāyām
mandara meha kkhohia sasi kalahaṃsa pariamu
kva salila ucchraṅgam
hikkamīṇa cakkāa juama
iti atra ca rūpake tathā anya alaṅkāreṣu aucityam eva na upayogaḥ

original: ocityaṃ hi siddhasya sataḥ prakṛtārthopalambhakaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: ocityam hi siddhasya sataḥ prakṛta artha upalambhakam bhavati

original: upayogaḥ punaḥ siddhāveva prakṛtārthahetutāṃ bhajate ityanayormahānbhedaḥ /
analyzed: upayogaḥ punar siddhau eva prakṛta artha hetutām bhajate iti anayoḥ mahān bhedaḥ
tathā hi
ananvaye ca śabda aikma aucityāt ānuṣaṅgikam
asmin tu lāṭānuprāse sākṣāt eva prayojakam
iti atra ekasya eva śabda aikyasya aucitya upayogābhyām bhedaḥ uktaḥ
atas ca aucitya upayogayoḥ bheda bhaja anudbhiḥ sarvatra eva prakṛta upayogitvam anyaiḥ yat uktam tat ayuktam
tasmāt rūpakāt anyaḥ eva pariṇāmaḥ

original: iha punaḥ aprakṛtārthasya prakṛtārthāropamantareṇa siddhireva na bhavatīti prakṛtopayogitaiva jīvitam /
analyzed: iha punar aprakṛta arthasya prakṛta artha āropam antareṇa siddhiḥ eva na bhavati iti prakṛta upayogi tā eva jīvitam

original: 'dāho 'mbhaḥ prasṛtipacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇālecitaḥ śvāsāḥ preṅkhitadīpradīpalatikāḥ pāṇḍimni magnaṃ vapuḥ /
analyzed: dāhaḥ mbhaḥ prasṛti pacaḥ pracayavān bāṣpaḥ praṇāla īcitaḥ śvāsāḥ preṅkhita dīpra dīpa latikāḥ pāṇḍimni magnam vapuḥ

original: kiṃ vānyatkathayāmi rātrimakhilāṃ tvanbhārgavātāyane hastacchrattraniruddhacandramahasastasyāḥ sthitirvartate' //
analyzed: kim vā anyat kathayāmi rātrim akhilām tvad bhārgava atāyane hasta chrattra niruddha candra mahasaḥ tasyāḥ sthitiḥ vartate

original: atra hi cchratrtāropamantareṇa candrātaparodha eva na bhavatīti tasya prakṛtopayogitvam /
analyzed: atra hi chratrtā āropam antareṇa candra ātapa rodhaḥ eva na bhavati iti tasya prakṛta upayogi tvam
atas ca prakṛtam aprakṛta tayā pariṇamati iti pariṇāmaḥ

original: yadyevaṃ tarhi sāṃkhyīyapariṇāmādasya ko viśeṣa ityāśaṅkyaha-āgametyādi /
analyzed: yadi evam tarhi sāṃkhyīya pariṇāmāt asya kaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha āgama ityādi
jahat haramra antaram pūrvam upādatte yadā hi ayam
tattvāt apracyutaḥ dharmī pariṇāmaḥ saḥ ucyate
iti sāṃkhyīya pariṇāma lakṣaṇam
maitrtī rūpa tayā iti
maitryā ātmatayā iti arthaḥ
upayogāt iti
ātaram antareṇa taraṇā yogāt

original: ataśca prakṛte yata ātarasyopayogastataśca prakṛtāyā eva maitryāstatkāryakāritvāttadvyavahārāropaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca prakṛte yatas ātarasya upayogaḥ tatas ca prakṛtāyāḥ eva maitryāḥ tad kārya kāri tvāt tad vyavahāra āropaḥ
etat eva dṛṣṭānta mukhena api pratipādayati tat atra ityādinā
atra iti pariṇāme

original: yadyevaṃ tarhi samāsoktipariṇāmayoḥ ko viśeṣa ityāśaṅkyāha-kevalamityādi /

abheda prādhānye āropaḥ iti eva
viṣayaḥ prakṛtaḥ rtaḥ

tena prakṛta aprakṛta gata tvena kavi pratibhā utthāpite saṃdehe saṃdeha alaṅkāraḥ
viṣayasya ityādi

tena viṣayasya viṣayiṇaḥ ca saṃdeha pratīti viṣaya tva sūtra arthaḥ

original: nanu viṣayaśabdena viṣayiśabdasya saṃbandhiśabdatvādākṣepe 'pi vinā vacanamākṣepamātrādviṣayiṇaḥ kathaṃ saṃdihyamānatā labhyata iti cet, na
analyzed: nanu viṣaya śabdena viṣayi śabdasya saṃbandhi śabda tvāt ākṣepe vinā vacanam ākṣepa mātrāt viṣayiṇaḥ katham saṃdihyamāna tā labhyate iti ced na
aniyata ubhaya aṃśa avalambi vimarśa rūpa tvāt vipaya mātra gata tvena asaṃbhavāt saṃdehasya anyathā anupapattyā viṣayiṇaḥ tad saṃbandhi tvam labhyate eva iti yathā sūtritam eva
jyāyaḥ
etat eva vibhajya vyācaṣṭe viṣayaḥ ityādinā
yad bhitti tvena iti

original: anyathā hyaprakṛtasya nirviṣayatvamaprantutābhidhānalakṣaṇo vā doṣaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anyathā hi aprakṛtasya nirviṣaya tvam aprantu tā abhidhāna lakṣaṇaḥ vā doṣaḥ syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: na kevalaṃ viṣayiṇa eva saṃdihyamānatvaṃ yāvadviṣayasyāpātyapiśabdāthaḥ /
analyzed: na kevalam viṣayiṇaḥ eva saṃdihyamāna tvam yāvat viṣayasya apāti api śabda athaḥ

original: tena kvacidviṣayiṇāmeva saṃdihyamānatve kvacicca viṣayaviṣayiṇorapyalaṅkāro bhavet /

ubhayatra api sāmānya lakṣaṇa anugamāt

original: ata eva ca prakṛtāprakṛtagatatveneti yathāsaṃbhavaṃ yojyam /
analyzed: atas eva ca prakṛta aprakṛta gata tvena iti yathāsaṃbhavam yojyam

sa ca trividhaḥ
śuddhaḥ niścaya garbhaḥ niścaya antaḥ ca
śuddhaḥ yatra saṃśayaḥ eva paryavasānam
yathā

original: 'kiṃ tāruṇyataroriyaṃ rasabharodbhinnā navā vallarī līlāprocchalitasya kiṃ laharikā lāvaṇyavārāṃnidheḥ /
analyzed: kim tāruṇya taroḥ iyam rasa bhara udbhinnā navā vallarī līlā procchalitasya kim laharikā lāvaṇya vārāṃnidheḥ

original: udgāḍhotkalikāvatāṃ svasamayopanyāsavistrambhiṇaḥ kiṃ sākṣādupadeśayaṣṭirathavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ' //
analyzed: udgāḍha utkalikāvatām sva samaya upanyāsa vistrambhiṇaḥ kim sākṣāt upadeśa yaṣṭiḥ athavā devasya śṛṅgāriṇaḥ
niścaya garbhaḥ yaḥ saṃśaya upakramaḥ niścaya madhyaḥ saṃśaya antaḥ ca
sa yathā

original: 'ayaṃ mārtaṇḍaḥ kiṃ sa khalu turagaiḥ satpabhiritaḥ kṛśānuḥ kiṃ sākṣātprasarati diśo naiṣa niyatam /
analyzed: ayam mārtaṇḍaḥ kim sa khalu turagaiḥ satpabhiḥ itas kṛśānuḥ kim sākṣāt prasarati diśaḥ nā eṣa niyatam

original: kṛtāntaḥ kiṃ sākṣānmahiṣavahano 'sāviti cirāt samalokyājau tvāṃ vidadhati vikalpānpratibhaṭāḥ' //
analyzed: kṛtāntaḥ kim sākṣāt mahiṣavahano sau iti cirāt samalokya ājau tvām vidadhati vikalpān pratibhaṭāḥ

original: niścayānto yatra saṃśaya upakramo niścaye paryavasānam /
analyzed: niścaya antaḥ yatra saṃśayaḥ upakramaḥ niścaye paryavasānam
yathā

original: 'induḥ kiṃ kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijametatkimambu kutra gatam /
analyzed: induḥ kim kva kalaṅkaḥ sarasijam etat kim ambu kutra gatam
lalita savilāsa vacanaiḥ mukham iti hariṇa akṣi niścitam paratas
kacid āropyamāṇānām bhinna āśraya tvena dṛśyate
yathā

original: 'rañjitā nu vividhāstaruśailā nāmitaṃ tu gaganaṃ mthagitaṃ nu /
analyzed: rañjitāḥ nu vividhāḥ taru śailāḥ nāmitam tu gaganam mthagitam nu

original: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtā nu kakubhastimireṇa' //
analyzed: pūritā nu viṣameṣu dharitrī saṃhṛtāḥ nu kakubhaḥ timireṇa
atra āropa viṣaye timire rāga ādi taru ādi bhinna āśraya tvena āropitam
kecid tu adhyavasāya āśraya tvena saṃdeha prakāram āhuḥ
anye tu nuśabdasya saṃbhāvanā dyota tvāt utprekṣā prakāram imam ācakṣate
etat eva bheda trayam vivṛṇvan udāharati śuddhaḥ ityādi
atra prakṛtāyāḥ tanvyāḥ saṃdeha pratīti viṣaya tva abhāvāt viṣayiṇām mañjarī ādīnām eva saṃdehaḥ
viṣaya viṣayiṇoḥ yathā

original: 'kiṃ paṅkajaṃ kimu sudhākarabimbametaktaṃ vā mukhaṃ klamaharaṃ madirekṣaṇāyāḥ /
analyzed: kim paṅkajam kimu sudhākara bimbam etaktam vā mukham klama haram madirā īkṣaṇāyāḥ
yat daśyate madhukara ābha kuraṅga kānti netra dvaya anukṛti kārṣṇyam amuṣya madhye
atra klama hara tva ādiḥ samānaḥ dharmaḥ nugāmi tvena upāttaḥ
kvacid vastu prativastu bhāvena api bhavati yathā
kim idam asita ali kalitam kamalam kim vā mukham su nīla kacam
iti saṃśete lokaḥ tvayi su tanu sa roca tīrṇāyām
atra asita tva sunīla tvayoḥ śuddha sāmānya rūpa tvam
ali kacānām ca bimba pratibimba bhāvaḥ
evam ca asya sādṛśya nimitta tvāt samāna dharma aneka dharma nimitta tvena dvi bheda tvam na vyākāryam
sādṛśya nimitta tvena eva asya saṃgraha siddheḥ
vipratapatti ādi nimitta antara vat cāru tva abhāvāt ca
bhinna āśraya tvena iti vaiyadhikaraṇyena
avautra pakṣa antaram āha kecid ityādi
anena ca saṃdehasya adhyavasāya mūla tvam api granthakṛtā evā uktam
tena adhyavasāya āśrayaḥ u pi ayam svarūpa hetu phalānām saṃdihyamāna tvena tridhā bhavati
tatra svarūpa saṃdehaḥ yathā ārañjitāḥ ityādi eva
yathā va

original: 'etattarkaya kairavaklamahare śṛṅgāradīkṣāgurau dikkāntāmukure cakorasuhṛdi prauḍhe tuṣāparatviṣi /
analyzed: etat tarkaya kairava klama hare śṛṅgāra dīkṣā gurau dikkāntā mukure cakora suhṛdi prauḍhe tuṣa apara tviṣi

original: karpūraiḥ kimapūri kiṃ malayajairālepi kiṃ pāradai- rakṣāli sphaṭikopalaiḥ kimaghaṭi dyāvāpṛthivyorvapuḥ' //
analyzed: karpūraiḥ kim apūri kim malayajaiḥ ālepi kim pāradaiḥ sphaṭika upalaiḥ kim aghaṭi dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ vapuḥ
atra kaumudī dhavalimnaḥ karpūra pūraṇa ādinā adhyavasita tvāt adhyavasāya mūla tvam
hetu saṃdehaḥ yathā

original: 'divi tvakṣaraṇāmbujasmṛtividhau gāḍhāvadhānaspṛśāṃ dhanyānāṃ prasaranti saṃtatatayā ye bāṣpadhārābharāḥ /
analyzed: divi tu akṣaraṇa ambuja smṛti vidhau gāḍha avadhāna spṛśām dhanyānām prasaranti saṃtata tayā ye bāṣpa dhārā bharāḥ
kim te syuḥ cira kāla bhāvita bhava a praśna kriyā vegataḥ kim vā āsādita mukti candra vadana a saṃdarśana ānandataḥ
atra aśru hetoḥ ānandasya saṃsāra viyogaḥ mukti sāṃmukhyam ca iti hetu dvayam adhyavasitam
phala saṃdehaḥ yathā

original: 'nṛttānte pārijātaṃ kimu vighaṭayituṃ spraṣṭumākāśagaṅgāṃ kiṃsvidvā candrasūryau kimu vidalayituṃ ścetaraktābjabuddhathā /

original: 'oṣṭhe bimbaphalāśayālamalakeṣūtpākajambūdhiyā karṇolaṅkṛtibhāji dāḍimaphalabhrāntyā ca śoṇe bhaṇau /

original: 'devamapi harṣaṃ pitṛśokavihnalīkṛtaṃ śriyaṃ śāpa iti mahīṃ mahāpātakamiti rājyaṃ roga iti bhogānbhujagā iti nilayaṃ niraya ityādi manyamānam'  #

original: 'dutuṃ vācchati dakṣiṇe 'pi nayane vāmaḥ karaḥ kajjalaṃ bhaujaṅgaṃ ca bhujo 'ṅgadaṃ ghaṭayituṃ vāme 'pi vāmetaraḥ /

etat eva abhyupagamya pratividhatte satyam ityādinā
tāvat śrabdaḥ rūpaka abhāva vipratipatti dyotana artham
tad rūpa tāyāḥ iti tapaḥ vana ādi rūpa tāyāḥ

original: atrāpi yadanyairavayavibhāvasaṃbandhātsāropāyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ sattvādrapakālaṅkāramāśaṅkya viviktatvasya cintyatvamuktaṃ tadayuktam /
analyzed: atra api yat anyaiḥ avayavi bhāva saṃbandhāt sāropāyāḥ lakṣaṇāyāḥ sattvāt rapaka alaṅkāram āśaṅkya vivikta tvasya cintya tvam uktam tat ayuktam
avayava avayatri bhāva saṃbandha abhāvāt lakṣaṇāyāḥ eva asattvāt

original: nahi śrīkaṇṭhākhye janapade tapovanamavayavanyāyena kutrāpyekadeśe 'sti yattatrāvayavini munibhirāropitam /
analyzed: nahi śrīkaṇṭha ākhye janapade tapovanam avayava nyāyena kutra api eka deśe sti yat tatra avayavini munibhiḥ āropitam

original: kiṃ tu tattadguṇayoginaḥ śrīkaṇṭhasya viviktatvāditapovanādiguṇamukhena nijanijavāsanānusāreṇārthitvādinā muniprabhṛtīnāmīdṛgābhāsaḥ /
analyzed: kim tu tad tad guṇa yoginaḥ śrīkaṇṭhasya vivikta tva ādi tapaḥ vana ādi guṇa mukhena nija nija vāsanā anusāreṇa arthi tva ādinā muni prabhṛtīnām īdṛś ābhāsaḥ
atha api yat yaḥ tu atra yava avayavi bhāva vivakṣā tad lakṣaṇa mātram na rūpakam
tasya lakṣaṇā parama artha tve pi viṣayasya rūpavataḥ karaṇāt alaṅkāra tvam
anyathā tu lakṣaṇā mātram eva
nahi lakṣaṇā api rūpaka parama arthā
iha ca tapaḥ vana ādi āropeṇa āropa viṣayasya na atiśayaḥ kaścid
vastutas eva tad rūpa tāyāḥ saṃbhavāt
atas ca sthitaḥ eva atra rūpaka viviktaḥ sya viṣayaḥ

original: na kevalamanyālaṅkāravivikto 'yamevāsyaviṣayo yāvade yatrāpi rūpakālaṅkārayogo 'sti tatrāpyayaṃ saṃbhavatyeveti darśayitumāha-yatretyādi /
analyzed: na kevalam anya alaṅkāra viviktaḥ yam eva āsya viṣayaḥ yāvade yatra api rūpaka alaṅkāra yogaḥ sti tatra api ayam saṃbhavati eva iti darśayitum āha yatra ityādi
iyam api bhaṅgiḥ iti ekasya anekadhā grahaṇa rūpā
etāvatā iti rūpaka prayoga mātreṇa
tatas ca iti rūpaka ullekhayoḥ saṃkarāt

original: nanu yatra rūpakayogo nāstitadalaṅkārāntarayogaḥ saṃbhavatītyāha-evaṃ hītyādi /
analyzed: nanu yatra rūpaka yogaḥ na asti tad alaṅkāra antara yogaḥ saṃbhavati iti āha evam hi ityādi
a tad rūpasya iti
a tapaḥ vana rūpasya api tapaḥ vana rūpa tva upanibandhanāt
a tasmin tad grahe bhrama eti etat eva hi bhrama sa tattvam
apūrvasya iti bhrāntimat asaṃbhavinaḥ
tad hetuka tvāt iti anekadhā grahaṇa ākhyā atiśaya nimittaka tvāt

original: yadi cātra bhrāntimānapyasti tattena sahāśya saṃkara evāstvityāha-saṃkaretyādi /
analyzed: yadi ca atra bhrāntimān api asti tat tena saha āśya saṃkaraḥ evā astu iti āha saṃkara ityādi
yadi evam iti
bhrāntimān api asti tat tena saha asya saṃkaraḥ eva astu iti āha saṃkara ityādi
yadi evam iti
bhrāntimataḥ sya viśeṣaḥ tena saha asya saṃkaraḥ vā iti arthaḥ
eṣaḥ iti atiśayokti sadbhāvaḥ
vibhāgasya
vicchitti antara tvam eva hi sarveṣām alaṅkārāṇām bheda hetuḥ
tat evam tad tad śrakkā nirāsa pūrvam amum eva siddhāntīkṛtya punar api udāharati
atra ca nārāyaṇa tva ādi ullekhane vṛddhā prabhṛtīnām yathākrama
tad pratibhā uttpatti hetuḥ iti
śleṣam antareṇa atra ān lekhā niṣpatteḥ
tad abhāve iti
ullekhā abhāvaḥ
atas tā iti śleṣa abāve pi etad dicchitti saṃbhavāt
evaṃvidhaḥ iti viṣaya bheda rūpe
tat tu yathā

original: 'savrīḍā dayitānane sakaruṇā mātaṅgacarmāmbare satrāsā bhujage savismayarasā candre 'mṛtasyandini /
analyzed: sa vrīḍā dayita ānane sa karuṇā mātaṅga carma ambare sa trāsā bhujage sa vismaya rasā candre mṛta syandini

original: serṣyā jahvasutāvalokanavidhau dīnā kapālodare pārvatyā navasaṃgamapraṇayinī dṛṣṭiḥ śivāyāstu vaḥ' //
analyzed: sa īrṣyā jahva sutā avalokana vidhau dīnā kapāla udare pārvatyāḥ nava saṃgama praṇayinī dṛṣṭiḥ śivāyāḥ astu vaḥ
atra ekasyāḥ eva dṛṣṭeḥ tad tad viṣaya bhedena nānātva ullekhanam
tat ayam
dvi prakāraḥ api rūpaka ādi āśraya vat anya alaṅkāra āśrayaḥ api saṃbhavati iti āha evam alaṅkāra antara ityādi
tatra ādyaḥ prakāraḥ saṃdeha āśrayaḥ yathā

original: 'kiṃ bhānuḥ kimu citrabhānuriti yaṃ niścinvate vairiṇaḥ kiṃ cintāmaṇireṣa kalpaviṭapī kiṃ veti cāśāgatāḥ /
analyzed: kim bhānuḥ kimu citrabhānuḥ iti yam niścinvate vairiṇaḥ kim cintāmaṇiḥ eṣa kalpa viṭapī kim vā iti ca āśā gatāḥ

original: kiṃ puṣpākara eṣa puṣpaviśikhaḥ kiṃ veti rāmājanaḥ kiṃ rāmaḥ kimu jāmadagnya iti vā yaṃ dhanvino manvate' //
analyzed: kim puṣpa ākaraḥ eṣa puṣpa viśikhaḥ kim vā iti rāma ajanaḥ kim rāmaḥ kimu jāmadagnyaḥ iti vā yam dhanvinaḥ manvate
atra akasya eva saṃdihyamāna aneka dhātu ullekhanam
atiśayokti āśrayaḥ ca ayam eva yathā

original: 'vajraṃ saurājyasākṣī parikalitamahāḥ śaktimārdrāparādho daṇḍaṃ khaḍgaṃ ripustrīprasabhaharaṇavitkūpavāpyādidṛśvā /
analyzed: vajram saurājya sākṣī parikalita mahāḥ śaktim ārdra aparādhaḥ daṇḍam khaḍgam ripu strī prasabha haraṇa vid kūpa vāpī ādidṛśvā

original: pāśāṃ pāṇāvapaśyandhvajamapi balavitkoṣavedī gadāṃ ca svācchrandyajñastriśūlaṃ likhati karatale deva citrākṛteste' //
analyzed: pāśām pāṇau apaśyan dhvajam api bala vid koṣa vedī gadām ca svācchrandya jñaḥ triśūlam likhati kara tale deva citra ākṛteḥ te

original: atra tvamedendra ityādyatiśayoktyā lokapālābhedo rājña upalabhyate ityekasyānekadhātvollekhanam /
analyzed: atra tvam edā indraḥ ityādi atiśayoktyā lokapāla abhedaḥ rājñaḥ upalabhyate iti ekasya aneka dhātu ullekhanam
viṣaya bhedena ca rūpaka āśrayaḥ yathā
mūrghni adredha ṛtu rāgaḥ taruṣu kisalayam vidruma odhaḥ samudre diś mātaṅga uttamāṅgeṣu abhinava nihitaḥ sāndra sindūra reṇuḥ

original: sīmni vyognaśca henmaḥ suraśikharibhuvo jāyate yaḥ prakāśaḥ śoṇimnāsau kharāṃśoruṣasi diśatu vaḥ śarma raśmipratānaḥ' //
analyzed: sīmni vyognaḥ ca sura śikhari bhuvaḥ jāyate yaḥ prakāśaḥ śoṇimnā asau kharāṃśoḥ uṣasi diśatu vaḥ śarma raśmi pratānaḥ
atra ekasya eva viṣaya bhedena rūpaka āśrayam nānātvam
kāraka antare iti apapāṭhaḥ
ayam svarūpa hetu phala ullekhana rūpa tvāt tridhā
tatra svarūpa ullekhaḥ samanantaram eva udāhṛtaḥ
hetu ullekaḥ tu yathā
sarga hetoḥ sadā dharmaḥ sthiti hantoḥ api prajāḥ
dviṣaḥ saṃhāra hetoḥ ca viduḥ tvām jātam ātmanaḥ
atra ekasya eva janmanaḥ hetūnām aneka dhātu ullekhanam
phala ullokhaḥ tu yathā

original: 'dharmāyaiva vidanti pārthiva yathāśāstraṃ prajāḥ pālitā arthāyaiva ca jānate 'ntaravidaḥ koṣaikadeśatya ye /
analyzed: dharmāya eva vidanti pārthiva yathāśāstram prajāḥ pālitāḥ arthāya eva ca jānate ntara vidaḥ ye

original: kāmāyaiva kṛtārthatāmupagatā nārthaśca niścinvate mokṣāyaiva ca veda janma bhavataḥ kaścidvipaścijjanaḥ' //
analyzed: kāmāya eva kṛtārtha tām upagatāḥ na arthaḥ ca niścinvate mokṣāya eva ca veda janma bhavataḥ kaścid vipaścit janaḥ
atra ekasya eva janmanaḥ phalānām aneka dhātu ullekhanam

viṣayasya apahnave pahnutiḥ

apahnava pūrvakaḥ āropaḥ
āropa pūrvakā upahnavaḥ
chala ādi śabdaiḥ asatya tva pratipādakaiḥ vā apahnava nirdeśaḥ
tṛtīya bhede tu eka vākya tvam
ādyaḥ yathā

original: 'yadetaccandrāntarjaladalavalīlāṃ prakurute tadācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśaka iti no māṃ prati tathā /
analyzed: yat etat candra antar jalada lava līlām prakurute tat ācaṣṭe lokaḥ śaśakaḥ iti no mām prati tathā
aham tu indum manye tvad ari viraha ākrānta taruṇī kaṭākṣa ulkā pāta vraṇa kiṇa kalaṅka aṅkita tanum

original: atraindavasya śaśasyāpahnave upakṣitpe śaśakaprativastukiṇavata indorāropo nānvayaghaṭanāṃ puṣyatīti na niravadyam /
analyzed: atra aindavasya śaśasya apahnave śaśaka prativastu kiṇavataḥ indoḥ āropaḥ na anvaya ghaṭanām puṣyati iti na niravadyam

original: tattu yathā 'pūrṇendoḥ paripoṣakāntavapuṣaḥ sphāraprabhābhāsvaraṃ nedaṃ maṇḍalamabhyayudeni gaganābhoge jigīṣorjagat /
analyzed: tat tu yathā pūrṇa indoḥ paripoṣa kānta vapuṣaḥ sphāra prabhā bhāsvaram na idam maṇḍalam gagana ābhoge jigīṣoḥ jagat
bhārasya ucchritam ātapatra madhunā pāṇḍu pradeṣa śriyā māna unnaddha jana abhimāna dalana udyoga eka hevākinaḥ
dvitīyaḥ yathā

original: na tu rucirakalāpe vartate yo mayūre vitaratu sa kumāro brahmacaryaśriyaṃ vaḥ' //
analyzed: na tu rucira kalāpe vartate yaḥ mayūre vitaratu sa kumāraḥ brahmacarya śriyam vaḥ
tṛtīyaḥ yathā

original: atra śūnya ityasya sthāne manyeśabdaprayoge sāpahnavotprekṣā ittayapi sthāpayiṣyate,
analyzed: atra śūnyaḥ iti asya sthāne manye śabda prayoge sa apahnavā utprekṣā sthāpayiṣyate

original: ' ahaṃ tvinduṃ manye ' iti tu vākyabhede manyeśabdaprayogenotprekṣeti ca vakṣyate /
analyzed: aham tu indum manye iti tu vākya bhede manye śabda prayogena utprekṣā iti ca vakṣyate

original: etasminnapi bhedo 'pahnavāropayoḥ paurvāparyaprayogaviparyaye bhedadvayaṃ sadapi na pūrvavaccitratāvahamiti na bhedatvena gaṇitam /
analyzed: etasmin api upahnava āropayoḥ paurvāparya prayoga viparyaye bheda dvayam sat api na pūrvavat citra tā āvaham iti na bheda tvena gaṇitam

āropa pūrvake tu apahnave yathā

original: ata eva kecana maṇḍūkaplutinyāyenānuvartanasyānucitatvād bhrāntimadanantaramapahnutirgranthakṛtā lakṣitā ullekhaścatiśayoktyanantaramiti granthaṃ  #

na ca etat
yatas ullekhaḥ tāvat atiśayokti anantaram granthakṛtā na lakṣitaḥ

original: tatrāpi padārthavākyārthagatatvena teṣāṃ dvaividhyai'pi padārthagatamalaṅkāradvayaṃ krameṇocyate' iti /

original: ata eva collekhe 'pi tatsaṃbhavādvastvantarapratīternirantaramevānuvartanādihaivāsyā lakṣaṇamucitamiti yathāsthita eva granthaḥ sādhuḥ /
analyzed: atas eva ca ullekhe pi tad saṃbhavāt vastu antara pratīteḥ nirantaram eva anuvartanāt iha eva asyāḥ lakṣaṇam ucitam iti yathāsthitaḥ eva granthaḥ sādhuḥ

original: yadyevaṃ tardhullekhāpahlatyorihaiva viparyayeṇa kiṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ kṛtamityāśaṅkyāha-prakrāntetyādi /
analyzed: yadi evam tar dhullekhā apahlatyoḥ iha eva viparyayeṇa kim na lakṣaṇam kṛtam iti āśaṅkya āha prakrānta ityādi
idam iti apahnuti lakṣaṇam
tat eva vyācaṣṭe āripa ityādinā

tena
na viṣam viṣam iti āhuḥ brahyaḥ tvam viṣam ucyate
viṣam ekākinam hanti brahma svam tu sa saṃtatim

original: ityatra viṣayasya niṣedhapūrvaṃ brahmasvaviṣaya āropyamāṇatvād dṛḍhāropaṃ rūpakameva nāpahnutiḥ /
analyzed: iti atra viṣayasya niṣedha pūrvam brahma sva viṣaye āropyamāṇa tvāt dṛḍha āropam rūpakam eva na apahnutiḥ
apahnuteḥ hi niṣedhya viṣaya bhitti tayā eva anyasya viṣayiṇaḥ vidhānam lakṣaṇam

original: atra tu niṣedhyasyaiva viṣasya brahmasvaviṣaye āropyamāṇatvādvidhānam / atha
analyzed: atra tu niṣedhyasya eva viṣasya brahma sva viṣaye āropyamāṇa tvāt vidhānam atha

original: 'atra mukhyasya viṣasya niṣedheāropyamāṇatvāt brahmasvaviṣasya gauṇasya vidhānam' - [alaṅkāraratnākare pṛ.42] iti cet,
analyzed: atra mukhyasya viṣasya niṣedhe āropyamāṇa tvāt brahma sva viṣasya gauṇasya vidhānam alaṅkāraratnākare iti ced

original: tatra brahyasvaviṣasya gauṇasya vidhānamiti bhaṇiteḥ kor'thaḥ /
analyzed: tatra brahya sva viṣasya gauṇasya vidhānam iti bhaṇiteḥ kaḥ ṛthaḥ
kim brahmasya iti
tatra na ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: tatrāpyasya brahmasvaṃ viṣaṃ ceti na bhedenoktiḥ syāt /

nā api gauṇa tā sva arthe eva pravṛtteḥ

original: na cātra brahmasvaviṣamanyatra kutracidvartate yenāsya gauṇatā syāt /

original: evaṃ brahmasvatya dāḍharyena viṣasābhyapratītipratipipādayiṣayā tatra niṣedhapūrvaṃ viṣamāropitamiti dṛḍhāropameva rūpakaṃ yuktam /

original: vākyabheda iti ekavākyamiti cānena yathāsaṃbhavaṃ bhedatrayasya svarūpanirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /

tayā ca asyāḥ iva ādi śabda vat manyeśabdaḥ api pratipādakaḥ

atas ca atra avātpaḥ prāgalbhyam ityādau apahnati atu dāharaṇa tvam abhidadhataḥ samāne pi

original: nyāye 'no māṃ prati tathā' ityanena śaśakapakṣasya nirākṛtatvādanyasyānyarūpatayā
analyzed: nyāye no mām prati tathā iti anena śaśaka pakṣasya nirākṛta tvāt anyasya anya rūpa tayā
saṃbhāvanāyāḥ abhāvāt manyā iti anena kiṇa pakṣasya eva niścita tvāt atiśayokti tvam eva iti
manyante alaṅkāra ratnakara kāra ādayaḥ
teṣām pūrva apara vicāra kuśalānām kim abhidadhmaḥ

original: evamanyairatrānyatra codāharaṇādau bahuprakāraṃ skhalitaṃ tat punargrunthavistararabhayād,

original: atra punarupamānasyopameyarūpatāpariṇatau pariṇāma iti pariṇamālaṅkāratvaṃ syāt /

original: iha punaḥ śarvapluṣṭamadananipatanānumāpakatvena romāvalyapahnave dhūmaśikhāyā evaṃ prādhānyaṃ vivakṣitamiti na pariṇāmaḥ nāpi rūpakam /
analyzed: iha punar śarva pluṣṭa madana nipatana anumāpaka tvena romāvalī apahnave dhūmaśikhāyāḥ evam prādhānyam vivakṣitam iti na pariṇāmaḥ na api rūpakam

original: athātrāpi bhinnayoḥ sāmānādhikharaṇyāyogādekatarasya niṣedhaprātpavāropyamāṇasya ca niṣedhānupapatterāropaviṣayasyaiva paryavasāne niṣedhaḥ  #
analyzed: atha atra api bhinnayoḥ sāmānādhika haraṇya ayogāt ekatarasya niṣedha prātpava āropyamāṇasya ca niṣedha anupapatteḥ āropa viṣayasya eva paryavasāne niṣedhaḥ

original: atra hi mukhādau candrādervṛtyabhāvād bādhitaḥ saṃścandrārthaḥ svātmasahacāriṇo guṇāṃllakṣayati na tu mukhāderviṣayasya niṣedhaḥ pratīyate

start sūtra
evam abheda prādhānye āropa garbhān alaṅkārān lakṣayitvā adhyavasāya garbhān lukṣayati tatra
adhyavasāye vyāpāra prādhānye utprekṣā
āropa garbhān iti
atra adhyavasāya garbha tvasya api vidyamāna tvāt malla grāmaḥ ityādi vat āropa garbhasya prādhānyāt evam vyapadeśaḥ
tatra tāvat utprekṣām lakṣayati adhyavasāyaḥ ityādi

original: adhyavasāya iti na punaḥ saṃdeha iti /
analyzed: adhyavasāyaḥ iti na punar saṃdehaḥ iti
iha hi niścaya aniśyaya rūpa tvena pratyayānām dvaividhyam
niścayaḥ ca artha avyabhicārī samyak
amyak
anyathā tu asamyak iti bhedaḥ na grāhyaḥ
pratīti vṛtti mātrasya eva iha vicārayitum upakrānta tvāt
tasya ca prāmāṇya vicāre upayogāt
aniścayaḥ ca saṃśaya tarka rūpa tvena dvividhaḥ
atas ca aniścitam ca saṃdagdham eva iti na vācyam
tarka ātmanaḥ saṃbhāvanā pratyayasya api aniścaya ātmaka tve sa digdha tva abhāvāt
utprekṣā saṃbhāvanā ādi śabda abhidheya tarkaṃpratīti mūlā iti na asyāḥ saṃdeha mūla tvam
tasya bhinna lakṣaṇa tvāt
atha anavadhāraṇa gha jñānam saṃśaya eti anavadhāraṇa jñāna tva aviśeṣāt saṃśayāt na artha antara abhāvaḥ tarkasya iti asyāḥ saṃśaya mūla tvam iti ced
anavadhāraṇa jñāna tva aviśeṣe saṃśa tarkayoḥ bhinna rūpa tvāt

original: tathāhi-sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti sāmānyena pakṣadvayollekhaḥ saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi sthāṇuḥ vā puruṣaḥ vā iti sāmānyena pakṣa dvaya ullekhaḥ saṃśayaḥ
puruṣeṇa anena bhavitavyam iti ekatara pakṣa anukūla kāraṇa darśanena pakṣa antara bādhanam iva tarkaḥ

original: puruṣa evāyamiti pakṣāntarāsaṃsparśenaikatarapakṣanirṇayo niścaya ityasti sahṛdayasākṣikaṃ pratyayānāṃ traividhyam /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva ayam iti pakṣa antara asaṃsparśena ekatara pakṣa nirṇayaḥ niścayaḥ iti asti sahṛdaya sākṣikam pratyayānām traividhyam
bāḍham asti eva pratyayānām traividhyam
kim tu anavadhāraṇa jñāna tva aviśeṣāt saśaya prakāraḥ tarkam iti
evam hi asamyak jñāna tva aviśeṣāt saṃśaya prakāraḥ syāt
artha niścaya aniścaya svabhāva tva ādinā asti anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ iti ced
iha punar na asti atra kim pramāṇam
saṃśayaḥ hi aniyata ubhaya aṃśa avalambi tvena udeti
tarkaḥ punar aṃśa antara bādhanena itra vāha keli darśana ādi anukūla kāraṇa aucityāt aṃśa antara avalambanena ca iti asti anayoḥ viśeṣaḥ

original: deśāntare hi yathā spardhamāna eva sthāṇupakṣa āste na tathā vāhakelibhūmau,
analyzed: deśa antare hi yathā spardhamānaḥ eva sthāṇu pakṣaḥ āste na tathā vāha keli bhūmau
api tu śithilībhavati

original: saṃbhavatpramādatvācca sarvātmanā na nivartata iti ata eva niścayaḥ sādhakapramāṇābhāve 'pyasyopapattaḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhavat pramāda tvāt ca sarva ātmanā na nivartate iti atas eva niścayaḥ sādhaka pramāṇa abhāve pi asya upapattaḥ

original: nahi sarvātmanā na nivartata iti ata eva niścayaḥ sādhakapramāṇābhāve 'pyasyopapattaḥ /
analyzed: nahi sarva ātmanā na nivartate iti atas eva niścayaḥ sādhaka pramāṇa abhāve pi asya upapattaḥ
nahi pratipakṣa bādhāt eva niścayaḥ bhavati
sādhāka bādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvena tad utpādāt
tena aniyata ubhaya pakṣa avalambī kim svid iti vimarśaḥ sa dehaḥ
ekatara pakṣa avalambī tu tarkaḥ iti

original: atha kāsya 'phalasyopāyaviśeṣaḥ ' ityekatarapakṣāvalambenāpi saṃdehaḥ saṃbhavatīti cet,naitat /
analyzed: atha kā asya phalasya upāya viśeṣaḥ iti ekatara pakṣa avalambena api saṃdehaḥ saṃbhavati iti cet nā etat
kim athana aniyata pakṣa antara svīkārāt ekatara pakṣa avalambanasya apratiṣṭhānāt

original: bāhyālīdarśanācca yathā puruṣaviśeṣāḥ smaraṇapathaṃ samavataranti na tathā sthāṇuviśeṣā
analyzed: bāhya ālī darśanāt ca yathā puruṣa viśeṣāḥ smaraṇa patham samavataranti na tathā sthāṇu viśeṣāḥ
iti ubhaya viśeṣa smaraṇa janmanaḥ saṃdehāt ekatara viśeṣa smaraṇa janmā viśiṣyate tarka
ityādi avāntara mati gahanam anayoḥ anti bheda sādhanam tat punar prakṛta anupayogāt iha na uktam
tena saṃdeha niścaya antarālavatīm tāndva lakṣaṇaḥ saṃbhāvanā pratyayaḥ triśaṅkuḥ iva lambamānaḥ vaśyā abhyupagantavyaḥ  /
evam api aniścaya ātmaka saṃbhāvanā pratyaya mūla tvāt utprekṣāyāḥ katham adhyavasāya mūla tvam
tasya hi viṣaya nigaraṇam viṣayi niścayaḥ ca svarūpam
na ca atra ekam api saṃbhavati
viṣaya upādānāt niścaya abhāvāt ca iti
atrā ucyate iha dvidhā asti adhyavasāyaḥ svārasikaḥ utpāditaḥ ca

original: tatra svārasike viṣayānavagata eva nimittam tatsāmarthyātsvarasata eva viṣayipratīterullāsāt /
analyzed: tatra svārasike viṣaya anavagate eva nimittam tad sāmarthyāt svarasataḥ eva viṣayi pratīteḥ ullāsāt

original: na hyavagataśuktikāsvarūpanya pramātuḥ kadācidapi rajatamidamiti pratyayotpādaḥ syāt /
analyzed: na hi avagata śuktikā svarūpa pramātuḥ kadācid api rajatam idam iti pratyaya utpādaḥ syāt

original: itaratra tu viṣayamavagamyapi tadantaḥkāreṇa pratipattau svātmaparatantravikalpabalād viṣayapratipattimutpādayet /
analyzed: itaratra tu viṣayam avagamya api tad antaḥkāreṇa pratipattau sva ātma para tantra vikalpa balāt viṣaya pratipattim utpādayet

original: jānāna eva hi viṣayiviviktaṃ viṣayaṃ tatra prayojanaparagatā svārasikyeva tathāvidhā pratipattirvaktrānūdyate na tūtpādyate /
analyzed: jānānaḥ eva hi viṣayi viviktam viṣayam tatra prayojana para gatā svārasikyā iva tathāvidhā pratipattiḥ vaktrā anūdyate na tu utpādyate
yat āhuḥ
pramātṛ antara dhīḥ bhānti rūpā yasmin anūdyate
sa bhrāntimān iti
svārasika tvam punar atra kavi pratibhā nirvatitam evā iṣṭam
anyathā hi bhrānti mātram syāt iti pūrvam eva uktam
itaraḥ tu utprekṣā viṣayaḥ
sa ca dvividhaḥ siddhaḥ sādhyaḥ ca
siddhaḥ yatra viṣayasya anupātta tayā nigīrṇa tvāt adhyavasita prādhānyam
sidhyaḥ yatra iva ādi upādānāt saṃbhāvanā pratyaya ātmaka tvāt viṣayasya nigīrṇa tvāt adhyavasita prādhānyam
sādhyaḥ yatra iva ādi upādānāt saṃbhāvanā pratyaya ātmaka tvāt viṣayasya nigīrya tvāt adhyavasita prādhānyam
sādhyaḥ yatra iva ādi upādānāt saṃbhāvanā pratyaya ātmaka tvāt viṣayasya nigīryamāṇa tvāt adhyavasāya kriyāyāḥ eva prādhānyam
atas eva aha vyāpāra prādhānye iti
atas eva ca atra kvicid viṣaya anupādānam
vācya upayogi adhyavasāyasya sādhyamāna vena upakrānta tvāt
kvicid ca viṣayasya anupādāne pi na siddha tvam
iva ādi ala pādānāt nigīryamāṇa tvāt āropa garbha tvam na vācyam
tatra viṣayasya viṣayi tayā pratītiḥ

original: iha punarvaṣayasya nigīryamāṇatvena viṣayiṇa eva pratītiḥ /
analyzed: iha nigīryamāṇa tvena viṣayiṇaḥ eva pratītiḥ
nanu viṣaya nigaraṇam adhyavasāyasya lakṣaṇam
iha punar viṣayasya nigīryamāṇa tā iti katham atra adhyavasāya tā iti cet nā etat

original: viṣayyantaḥkṛte 'nyasmin sā syātsādhyavasānikā' ityādyaktyādhyavasāyasya viṣayiṇā viṣayasyāntaḥkaraṇaṃ lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: viṣayi antar kṛte sā syāt sādhyavasānikā ityādi aktyā adhyavasāyasya viṣayiṇā viṣayasya antaḥkaraṇam lakṣaṇam

original: tacca viṣayasya nigaraṇena nigīryameṇatvena vā bhavatīti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca viṣayasya nigaraṇena nigīryameṇa tvena vā bhavati iti na kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: nigīryamāṇatvamapi pūrvoktanītyā viṣayasyopāttasyānupāttasya vā bhavatītina kaścidviśaśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: nigīryamāṇa tvam api pūrvokta nītyā viṣayasya upāttasya anupāttasya vā bhavati iti na kaścid viśaśeṣaḥ
evam sidhde dhyavasāye dhyavasita prādhānya sādhye ca svarūpa prādhānyam iti siddham

original: evacca granthakṛdeva vibhajyāgre vakṣyatīti tata evāvadhāyaṃm /
analyzed: evat ca granthakṛt eva vibhajya agre vakṣyati iti tatas eva avadhāyam
yat eva sā adhyavasāyasya sādhya tvam tat eva saṃbhāvanā ātmaka tvam

original: saṃbhāvanā hyekatarapakṣaśithilīkāreṇa pakṣāntaradārḍhyena ca prādurbhavatītyasyāḥ sādhyādhyavasāyatulpakakṣatvam /
analyzed: saṃbhāvanā hi ekatara pakṣa śithilīkāreṇa pakṣa antara dārḍhyena ca prādurbhavati iti asyāḥ sādhya adhyavasāya tulpa kakṣa tvam
tasya api viṣaya śithilīkāreṇa viṣayi dārḍhyena ca utpatteḥ

original: ata eva viṣayiṇo 'pi śabdena vṛttena satyantvam /
analyzed: atas eva śabdena vṛttena
viṣayi dārḍhyena eva sādhya adhyavasāya tva rūpa prādurbhāvāt

original: yaduktaṃ bhavadbhireva 'saṃbhāvanāyāṃ ca saṃbhāvyamānasya dārḍhyādaparasya na śauthilyāt' iti /
analyzed: yat uktam bhavadbhiḥ eva saṃbhāvanāyām ca saṃbhāvyamānasya dārḍhyāt aparasya na śauthilyāt iti
iha saṃbhāvyamānasya viṣayiṇaḥ dārḍhyāt atra saṃśayāt vailakṣaṇyam

original: tasya hyaniyatobhayāṃśāvalambī kiṃsviditi vimarśo lakṣaṇam saṃbhāvanāviṣayasya ca śauthilyānniścayādapi bhedaḥ /
analyzed: tasya hi aniyata ubhaya aṃśa avalambī kim svid iti vimarśaḥ lakṣaṇam saṃbhāvanā viṣayasya ca śauthilyāt niścayāt api bhedaḥ

original: viṣaye hi bādhakasadbhāvādekasya śaithilyena vā sādhakasadbhāvācca pakṣāntarasya siddhiḥ syāt /
analyzed: viṣaye hi bādhaka sadbhāvāt ekasya śaithilyena vā sādhaka sadbhāvāt ca pakṣa antarasya siddhiḥ syāt
atiśayoktiḥ ca niścaya ātmikā iti tatas syāḥ bhedaḥ

original: yattu 'sādhyo yatra viṣayiṇo 'satyatayā pratītiḥ' ityādi granthakṛdvakṣyati tad vastuvṛttābhiprāyeṇāvagantavyam /
analyzed: yat tu sādhyaḥ yatra satya tayā pratītiḥ ityādi granthakṛt vakṣyati tat vastu vṛtta abhiprāyeṇa avagantavyam

original: tadevaṃ viṣayasya nigīryamāṇatvādviṣayiṇaśca niścayātsiddhamadhyavasāyamūlatvamasyā iti yathoktameva lakṣaṇaṃ paryālocitābhidhānam /
analyzed: tat evam viṣayasya nigīryamāṇa tvāt viṣayiṇaḥ ca niścayāt siddham adhyavasāya mūla tvam asyāḥ iti yathā uktam eva lakṣaṇam paryālocita abhidhānam
tasmāt
iva ādau niścaya abhāvāt viṣayasya parigrahāt
kvacid adhyavasāyena na utprekṣā api tu saṃśayāt
ityādi uktam ayuktam eva iti alam bahunā
sa ca dvividhaḥ sādhyaḥ siddhaḥ ca
sādhyaḥ yatra satya tayā pratītiḥ

original: asatyatvaṃ ca viṣayigatasya dharmasya viṣaya upanibandhe viṣayisaṃbhāvitvena viṣayāsaṃbhāvitvena ca pratīteḥ /

original: dharmo,guṇakriyārūpaḥ tasya saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapratītau saṃbhavāśrayasya tatrāparamārthatayā asatyatvaṃ pratīyate,

yasya asatya tvam

siddhaḥ yatra viṣayiṇaḥ satyasya api satya tā pratītiḥ
satva tvam ca pūrvakasya asatya tva nimittasya bhāvāt
atas ca adhyavasita prādhānyam

original: tatra sādhyatvapratītau vyāpāraprādhānye 'dhyavasāyaḥ saṃbhāvanamabhimānastarka ūhṛ utprekṣetyādiśabdairucyate /

tat evam aprakṛta gata guṇa kriyā abhisaṃbandhāt aprakṛta tvena prakṛtasya saṃbhāvanam utprekṣā
sā ca vācyā iva ādibhiḥ pradarśyate

original: prakṛtasyaitadbhedayoge 'pi na vaicitryamiti na te gaṇitāḥ /

original: tadevaṃ prakāravaicitryeṇāvasthitāyā utprekṣāyā hetūtprekṣāyāṃ yasya prakṛtasaṃbandhino

atrā indu kānteḥ saṃkoce viparyayeṇa śatapatrasya kāraṇa tvam adhyavasitam
atra bhede bhedaḥ iti evaṃrūpā atiśayoktiḥ hetu tvena sthitā
uttare tu ardhe sā eva śliṣṭa śabda nibandhanā hetuḥ

krama viparyayaḥ yathā
kupitasya prathamam andhakārī bhavati vidyā tatas bhrukuṭiḥ

caramam cakṣuḥ
ākambhe tapaḥ galati paścāt sveda salilam
pūrvam ayaśaḥ sphurati anantaram adharaḥ iti

original: atra kopakārye vidyābhrukuṭyādīnāmandhakārībhavanādau kramaṃ nigīrya tadviparyayo 'dhyavasitaḥ /
analyzed: atra kopa kārye vidyā bhrukuṭi ādīnām andhakārī bhavana ādau kramam nigīrya tad viparyayaḥ dhī avasitaḥ
tasya eva sahabhāve yathā
pariaṇaḥ masaṇam maṇimehalā
lajjā samosaranti samam
rati bhavanebhyaḥ parijanaḥ masṛṇam maṇi mekhalā nitambebhyaḥ
lajjāḥ hṛdayebhyaḥ samam apasaranti samam śiśi mukhīnām
atra parijana ādīnām apasaraṇe kramika tve sama kāla tvam adhyavasitam
evam eṣām sarveṣām eva bhedānām loka a sabhavat viṣaya tvam darśayitum āha
eṣu pañcasu bhedeṣu bhede bheda ādi vacanam loka atikrānta gocaram
atas ca atra atiśaya ākhyam yat phalam prayojaka tvāt nimittam tatra abheda adhyavasāyaḥ

original: tathā hi 'kamalamanambhasi' ityādau vadanādīnāṃ kamalādyairbhede 'pi vāstavaṃ saundaryaṃ kavisamarpitena saundaryeṇābhedenādhyavasitaṃ bhede  #
analyzed: tathā hi kamalam an ambhasi ityādau vadana ādīnām kamala ādyaiḥ bhede vāstavam saundaryam kavi samarpitena saundaryeṇa abhedena adhyavasitam bhede

na tu vadana ādīnām kamala ādibhiḥ abheda adhyavasāyaḥ yojanīyaḥ
abhede bhedaḥ ityādiṣu prakāreṣu a syāpteḥ

original: tatra hi 'aṇṇaṃ laḍahṛttaṇaaṃ' ityādau sātiśayaṃ laḍahatvaṃ nimittabhūtabhedenādhyavasitam /
analyzed: tatra hi aṇṇam ityādau sa atiśayam laḍaha tvam nimitta bhūta bhedena adhyavasitam
evam anyatra api jñeyam
tad abhiprāyeṇa eva adhyavasita prādhānyam

original: prakārapañcakamadhyātkāryakāraṇabhāvena yaḥ prakāraḥ sa kāryakāraṇatāśrayālaṅkāraprastāve prapañcārthaṃ lakṣiyiṣyate / @--------------------

phalam iti

original: nanu cātra vadanādīnāṃ kamalādyadhyavasāyaḥ pratīyata iti kathametaduktamityāśaṅkyāha-na tvityādi /

original: kamalamanambhasītyatra hi yadi vadanādīnāṃ dharmiṇāmabhedādhyavasāyayojanaṃ kriyate tattasya dhamigatatvenaiveṣṭeriha dharmāṇāṃ na syādavyātpiḥ
analyzed: kamalam an ambhasi iti atra hi yadi vadana ādīnām dharmiṇām abheda adhyavasāya yojanam kriyate tat tasya dhami gata tvena eva iṣṭeḥ iha dharmāṇām na syāt avyātpiḥ

original: ataśca pūrvatra dharmāṇābhevādhyavasāyo yojanīyo yena sarvatraika eva pakṣaḥ syāditi tātparyārthaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca pūrvatra yojanīyaḥ yena sarvatra ekaḥ eva pakṣaḥ syāt iti tātparyārthaḥ
upalakṣyam ca etat
yāvatā hi adhyavasita prādhānyam asyāḥ lakṣaṇam

original: tacca dharmiṇāmastu dharmāṇāṃ veti ko viśeṣo yenāvyātpiḥ syāt /

pratyuta dharmayoḥ abheda adhyavasāya abhyupagame upamā ādīnām api atiśayokti prasaṅgaḥ syāt
tatra api dharmāṇām eva bhede bheda vivakṣaṇāt

original: evaṃ cavijātīyatvena bhede dharmayorapyabhyātpiḥ prasajyata ityalamasaṅgatagranthārthodīraṇena /

evam adhyavasāya āśrayam alaṅkāra dvayam uktvā gamyamāna aupamya āśrayāḥ alaṅkārāḥ idānīm ucyante

a prākaraṇikānām yathā

original: [sū] 'sādṛśya yadi gamya [śabdataḥ akathita] ho ora [kevala] prasturto athavā [kevala] aprastutoṃ kā padārthastara para samānadharma-sambandha  #

anvita artha iti

original: 'āstāṃ tālasya saṃniddhe dve dhātryī tasya vṛddhaye /

start sūtra
prastuta aprastutayoḥ vyasta tve tulya yogitām pratipādya samasta tve dīpakam ucyate
prastuta aprastutānām tu dīpakam
aupamyasya gamya tve ityādi anuvartate
prākaraṇika aprākaraṇikayoḥ madhyāt ekatra nirdiṣṭaḥ samānaḥ dharmaḥ prasaṅgana anyatra upakārāt dīpanāt dīpa sādṛśyena dīpaka ākhya alaṅkāra utthāpakaḥ
tatra iva ādya prayogāt upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ gamyamānaḥ
sa ca vāstavaḥ eva
pūrvatra śuddha prākaraṇika tve vā vaivakṣikaḥ
prākaraṇika tva nirvartita tvāt upamāna upameya bhāvasya
anekasya eka kriyā abhisaṃbandhāt aucityāt padārtha tva uktiḥ

original: vastutastu vākyārthatve ādimadhyāntavākyagatatvena dharmasya vṛttāvādibhamadhyāntadīpakākhyāstrayo 'sya bhedāḥ / @--------------------
analyzed: vastutas tu vākya artha tve ādi madhya anta vākya gata tvena dharmasya vṛttau ādi bha madhya anta dīpaka ākhyāḥ trayaḥ bhedāḥ
prastuta aprastutānām iti
ekatra iti prākaraṇike prākaraṇike vā
anyatra iti prākaraṇika ādau dīpaka iti saṃjñāyām iti anena kan
sādṛśyena samudāya gamyāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ abhāvāt
tatra iti dīpake
vāstavaḥ iti
prakṛta aprakṛtayoḥ upamāna upameya rūpa tvāt
pūrvatra iti tulya yogitāyām
iyān eva ca dīpaka tulya yogitayoḥ viśeṣaḥ sti iti api anena darśitam
na ca etāvatā eva anayoḥ pṛthak lakṣaṇam yuktam
aupamya garbha tva ākhyasya sāmānyasya dvayoḥ api anugamāt
evam ca samucita upamā ādeḥ api pṛthak lakṣaṇam syāt
granthakṛtā punar cirantana anurodhāt kṛtam
vaivakṣikaḥ iti

original: yatraiva vakturupamānatvamupameyatvaṃ vā vaktumiṣṭaṃ tatraiva prakaraṇādibalādāśrayaṇīyamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yatra eva vaktuḥ upamāna tvam upameya tvam vā vaktum iṣṭam tatra eva prakaraṇa ādi balāt āśrayaṇīyam iti arthaḥ

original: ataśca 'prastutasya tu nānyena vyabhicārasya darśanāt' iti nītyāprastutāprastutatvamātranibandhana evopamānopameyabhāvo na bhavatīti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: atas ca prastutasya tu na anyena vyabhicārasya darśanāt iti nītyā aprastuta aprastuta tva mātra nibandhanaḥ eva upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ na bhavati iti bhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ 'prasiddhenāprasiddhasya sādṛśyamupamā matā'ityādidṛśā prasiddhāprasiddhatvamātranibandhano 'pyupamānopameyabhāvo na vācyaḥ /
analyzed: evam prasiddhena aprasiddhasya sādṛśyam upamā matā ityādi dṛśā prasiddha aprasiddha tva mātra nibandhanā u pi upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ na vācyaḥ

original: 'khamiva jalaṃ jalamiva kham' ityādau dvayorapi tulyatvāt prasiddhaguṇatvādyabhāve 'pyupamānopameyabhāvasyeṣṭervyabhicārasya darśasanāt /
analyzed: kham iva jalam jalam iva kham ityādau dvayoḥ api tulya tvāt prasiddha guṇa tva ādi abhāve pi upamāna upameya bhāvasya iṣṭeḥ vyabhicārasya

original: nanu cātra sādharmya vākyārthagatatvenaiva pratīyata iti kathaṃ tasya padārthagatatvamuktamityāśaṅkyāha-anekasyetyādi /

yathā
sādhūnām upakartum lakṣmīm dharttum vihāyasā gantum

original: na kutūhali kasya manaścaritaṃ ca mahātmanāṃ śrotum' //
analyzed: na kutūhali kasya manaḥ caritam ca mahātmanām śrotum

original: kāmajjaṇeṇa kāṇa vi kāṇa vi emea saṃsāro' //

phaṇā sahastra bhṛt adhas divi netra sahastra bhṛt
advitīyaḥ pṛthivyām ca bhavān nāma sahastra bhṛt

original: evamekāṃ kriyāṃ guṇaṃ vānekakārakagatatvenābhidhāya tadeva ca dṛṣṭāntīkṛtyaikakārakamapyanekakriyāgatatvena dīpakaṃ bhavatītyāha-atretyādi
analyzed: evam ekām kriyām guṇam vā aneka kāraka gata tvena abhidhāya tat eva ca dṛṣṭāntīkṛtya eka kārakam api aneka kriyā gata tvena dīpakam bhavati iti āha atra ityādi
atra ca ucchra vāsa varṇanīyam bhairava ācārya ādi saktam upakāra kāraṇa ādi viśeṣa rūpam prastutam
śrotṝn avabodhayitum kavi kartṛkam idam sādhu upakāra karaṇa ādīnām sāmānyānām aprastutānām praśaṃsanam

a sa tat iti dṛṣṭānta alaṅkāra vacanam
etat anyatra api yojayati evam ityādinā
ukta nyāyena iti
prakṛta vākya arthe vākya artha antarasya sāmānādhikaraṇyena adhyāropyamāṇa tvāt
atas ca anyaiḥ vākya arthayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya nidaśāt śrauta āropa sadbhāvena vākya artha rūpakam yat uktam tat tāvat āstām
yat putraḥ prativastūpamā udāharaṇa tvam uktam tat ayuktam eva
nirapekṣayoḥ vākya arthayoḥ dharmasya śuddha sāmānya rūpa tve prativastūpamā
na ca atra ekam api saṃbhavati
vākya arthayoḥ sāpekṣa tvāt śuddha sāmānya rūpa tva abhāvāt ca arthāpatti udāharaṇa tvam api atra ayuktam
jāgrataḥ kamalāt lakṣmīm yat jagrāha tat adbhutam
pāda dvandvasya matta ibha gati steye tu kā stutiḥ
iti atra tu prativastūpamā udāharaṇa tvam pāpāt pāpīyaḥ

original: atra hi vākyārthayoḥ parasparaṃ sādṛśyamātramapi nāstīti kā kathā prativastūpamāyāḥ /
analyzed: atra hi vākya arthayoḥ parasparam sādṛśya mātram api na asti iti kā kathā prativastūpamāyāḥ

original: evaṃvidhameva cānyatra sarvālaṅkārodāharaṇeṣvāsamañjasyaṃ saṃbhavadapi samanantaroktahetudvayāśca darśitam /
analyzed: evaṃvidham eva ca anyatra sarva alaṅkāra udāharaṇeṣu āsamañjasyam saṃbhavat api samanantara ukta hetu dvayāḥ ca darśitam
tathā ca
ājñā dharaḥ pañcaśaraḥ purastāt sudhā punar karmakarī mukhasya
sa ca api saundarya viśeṣa bandī yatra induḥ indīvara locanānām
iti atra viṣaya viṣayiṇoḥ dvayoḥ api upādānāt sphuṭe rūpaka tve tiśayokti udāharaṇa tvam uktam
tatra ca atiśayokti tvam eva nā asti iti kim
asaṃbhavat vastu saṃbandha nibandhanāyāḥ ca yadi api vastu saṃbandhasya aviśeṣeṇa saṃbhava
uktaḥ tathā api samanantara ukta udāharaṇeṣu yathā upamāna saṃbandhī dharmaḥ upameya gata tvena eva
saṃbhavati tathā eva upameya saṃbandhī dharmaḥ kvacid upamāne pi iti āha eyam ityādi

original: iyaṃ copemeya upamānavṛttasyāsaṃbhavātpratipāditā pūrvaiḥ vastutastūpameyavṛttasyopamāne 'saṃbhavādapi bhavati /
analyzed: iyam ca upemā iyaḥ upamāna vṛttasya asaṃbhavāt pratipāditā pūrvaiḥ vastutas tu upameya vṛttasya upamāne saṃbhavāt api bhavati
ubhayatra api saṃbandha vighaṭanasya vidyamāna tvāt
tat yathā viyoge gauḍa nārīṇām yaḥ gaṇḍa tala pāṇḍimā
alakṣyata sa kharjūrī mañjarī garbha reṇuṣu
atra gaṇḍa talam prakṛtam
tad dharmasya pāṇḍimnaḥ kharjūrī reṇuṣu asaṃbhavāt aupamya pratītiḥ
eṣa ca prakāraḥ śṛṅkhalā nyāyena api bhavati
yathā
muṇḍa sire bora phalam borovari boraam thiram dharasi
appā
ubhayatra iti upameye upamāne vā
vasanta varṇanasya prakrānta tvāt dvayoḥ prakṛta tve pi gaṇḍa talasya upameya tvam
tad bhata tvena eva pāṇḍimnaḥ sisādhayiṣita tvāt
sidhda sādhya dharma tvam eva
yathā vā
tvad vaktra lāvaṇyam idam mṛga akṣi saṃlakṣyate patyuḥ api kṣapāyāḥ
katham tu anena āhṛtam etat adya kalāvatām vā kim asādhyam asti
atra cāṭuṣu nāyikāyāḥ prastuta tvāt vaktram upameyam
tad dharmasya ca lāvaṇyasya upamāne śaśini asaṃbhavaḥ
eṣaḥ iti asaṃbhavat vastu saṃbandha nibandhanaḥ vā vācyaḥ
iyam api kvacid mālayā api bhavantī dṛśyate
yathā
araṇya ruditam kṛtam śava śarīram udvartitam sthale bjam avaropitam su ciram ūṣare varṣitam

original: śvapucchamavanāmitaṃ badhirakarṇajāpaḥ kṛtaḥ dhṛto 'ndhamukhadarpaṇo yadabudho janaḥ sevitaḥ' //
analyzed: śva puccham avanāmitam badhira karṇa jāpaḥ kṛtaḥ dhṛtaḥ yat abudhaḥ janaḥ sevitaḥ
kvacid punar niṣedha sāmarrthyāt ākṣitpāyāḥ prātpeḥ saṃbandha anupapattyā api bhavati
yathā

original: 'utkope tvayi kiñcideva calati drāggūrjarakṣmābhṛtā muktā bhūrna paraṃ bhayānmarujuṣāṃ yāvattadeṇīdṛśām /
analyzed: utkope tvayi kiñcid eva calati drāk gūrjara kṣmābhṛtā muktā bhūḥ na param bhayāt maru juṣām yāvat tad eṇī dṛśām

original: padbhyāṃ haṃsagatirmukhena śaśinaḥ kāntiḥ kucābhyāmapi kṣāmābhyāṃ sahasaiva vanyakariṇāṃ gaṇḍasthalīvibhramaḥ' //
analyzed: padbhyām haṃsa gatiḥ mukhena śaśinaḥ kāntiḥ kucābhyām api kṣāmābhyām sahasā eva vanya kariṇām gaṇḍa sthalī vibhramaḥ
atra muktena niṣedha padam tad anyathā anupapattyā pādayoḥ hasa gati prātpiḥ ākṣipyate

original: sā ca tayoranupapannā sādṛśyaṃ gamayatīti asaṃbhavadvastusaṃbanvanibandhanā nidarśanā / @--------------------
analyzed: sā ca tayoḥ anupapannā sādṛśyam gamayati iti asaṃbhavat vastu saṃbanva nibandhanā nidarśanā
ākṣit pāyai iti
prāt pi pūrvaka tvāt niṣedhasya

original: seti prātpiḥ sādṛśyamiti pādayorhasagatitulyāyā gateḥ pratīteḥ /
analyzed: sā iti sādṛśyam iti pādayoḥ hasa gati tulyāyāḥ gateḥ pratīteḥ
iyam ca sāmānyasya anugāmi tayā
yathā vaḥ ityādi
atra nisarga vakra tā akṣya dharmasya anugāmi tvam
śuddha sāmānya rūpa tvena yathā
hāreṇa āmalaka sthūla muktena āmukta kuntalaḥ
phaṇi indra baddha jūṭasya śriyam āpa sa dhūrjaṭeḥ
atra amukta baddhayoḥ śuddha sāmānya rūpa tvam
bimba pratibimba bhāvena yathā
uha sarasa danta ḍala kapola paḍimā gao
ante siṃdūria saṃkha vatta karāṇam vahai cando
paśya sa rasa danta maṇḍala kapola pratimā gataḥ mṛga akṣyāḥ
ante sindūrita śaṅkha āvartta karaṇīm kriyāṇu ahati candraḥ
atra danta maṇḍala sindūrita tvayoḥ bimba pratibimba bhāvaḥ
start sūtra

original: bhedaprādhānye upamānādupameyasyādhikye viparyaye vā vyatirekaḥ // RuAss_29 //

adhunā bheda prādhānyena alaṅkāra kathanam
bhedaḥ vailakṣaṇyam
sa ca dvidhā bhavati
upamānāt upameyasya adhika guṇa tve viparyaye vā bhāvāt
viparyayaḥ nyūna guṇa tvam
bheda prādhānye ityādi
adhunā iti
bhedasya ca atra prādhānyāt abhedasya vastutas sadbhāvaḥ
sādṛśye eva paryavasānāt

original: ata eva sādṛśyavyatirekeṇa saṃbhavannapi bhedo nāsya viṣayaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva sādṛśya vyatirekeṇa saṃbhavan api bhedaḥ na asya viṣayaḥ
yathā
divya uttarīya bhṛti kaustubha ranna bhāji deve pare dadhatu lubdha dhiyaḥ

original: rūpaṃ digambaramakhaṇṭanṛmuṇḍacūḍaṃ bhāvatkameva tu bateśa mama spṛhāyai' //
analyzed: rūpam digambaram akhaṇṭa nṛ muṇḍa cūḍam bhāvatkam eva tu bata īśa mama spṛhāyai

original: atra vaiṣṇavebhyaḥ svātmani viṣṇorvā parameśvare bhedamātraṃ vivakṣitaṃ na tu kenāpi kasyacidaupamyam /
analyzed: atra vaiṣṇavebhyaḥ svātmani viṣṇoḥ vā parameśvare bheda mātram vivakṣitam na tu kena api kasyacid aupamyam
saḥ iti bhedaḥ
tasya ādhikya viparyayābhyām vaividhyāt vayatirekaḥ dvividhaḥ
tad āśraya tvāt asya
krameṇa udāharaṇam diddakṣavaḥ pakṣya latā vilāsam akṣṇām sahasrasya manoharam te
vāpīṣu nīlotpalinī vikāsa rabhyāsu nandanti na ṣaṭpada odhāḥ

original: 'kṣīṇaḥ kṣoṇo 'pi śaśī bhūyo bhūyo vivardhate satyam /
analyzed: kṣīṇaḥ śaśī bhūyas bhūyas vivardhate satyam

original: virama prasīda sundari yauvanamanivarti yātaṃ tu' //
analyzed: virama prasīda sundari yauvanam anivarti yātam tu
atra vikasvara nīlotpalinī apekṣayā akṣi sahasrasya pakṣmala tayā adhika guṇa tvam

śaśi vailakṣaṇyena tasya apunarāgamāt
candra apekṣayā iti

original: śaśiyauvanayorhi samāne 'pi gatvaratve śaśinaḥ punarāgamanamapi saṃbhavati na tu yauvanasyeti tato 'sya nyūnaguṇavattvam /

nanu atra viparyayam evā iti sūtritam bheda antaram ayuktam
upamānāt upameyasya nyūna guṇa tve vāstava tvāt

original: yauvanasya cātrāsthiratve pratipādye pratipādye candrāpekṣayādhikaguṇatvameva vivakṣitam /
analyzed: yauvanasya ca atra asthira tve pratipādye pratipādye candra apekṣayā adhika guṇa tvam eva vivakṣitam

asat etat

original: yato 'tra candravad gataṃ sad yauvanaṃ yadi punarapyāgacchret tat priyaṃ prati ciramīrṣyānubandho yujyeta /

original: idaṃ punarhatayauvanaṃ yātaṃ satprunarnāgacchratītīrṣyādyantarāyaparihāreṇa nirantaratayaiva priyeṇa saha saphalayitavyamiti dhigīrṣyām,
analyzed: idam punar hata yauvanam yātam sat prunar nā gacchati iti īrṣyā ādi antarāya parihāreṇa nirantara tayā eva priyeṇa saha saphalayitavyam iti dhik īrṣyām

original: kuru prasādamityāsmin priyavayasyopadeśe priyaṃ prati kopopaśamāya candrāpekṣayā yauvanasyāpunarāgamanaṃ nyūnaguṇatvenaiva vivakṣitamiti vākyārthavida  #

eva pramāṇam

tat ca adhika guṇa mukhena bhavatu
itarathā vā kaḥ viśeṣaḥ
tasmāt yuktam eva viparyaye vā iti sūtritam

original: vataḥ 'svareṇa tasyā abhṛtastruteva' ityādāvanyaṣṭālāpasya pratikūlatvokteḥ karṇakaṭukatvādinā

upamāna upameyayoḥ ekasya prādhānya nirdeśe parasya saha artha saṃbandhe sahoktiḥ
bheda prādhānye iti eva
guṇa prādhāna bhāva nimittakam atra bheda prādhānyam
saha artha prayuktaḥ ca guṇa prādhāna bhāvaḥ
upamāna upameya tvam ca atra vaivakṣikam
dvayoḥ api prākaraṇika tvāt a prākaraṇika raṇika tvāt vā
saha artha sāmarthyāt hi tayoḥ tulya kakṣa tvam
tatra tṛtīyā antasya niyamena guṇa tvāt upamāna tvam
arthāt ca pariśiṣṭasya pradhāna tvāt upameya tvam
śabdaḥ ca atra guṇa prādhāna bhāvaḥ
vastutas tu syāt
tatra niyamena atiśayokti mūla tvam asyāḥ
sā ca kārya kāraṇa pratiniyama viparyaya rūpā abheda adhyavasāya rūpā ca
abheda adhyavasāyaḥ ca śleṣa bhittikaḥ nyathā vā
sāhityam ca atra katra ādi nānā bhedam jñeyam
tatra ca
kārya kāraṇa pratiniyama viparyaya rūpāḥ yathā
bhavat aparādhaiḥ sārdham saṃtāpaḥ vardhatetarām asyāḥ
atra aparādhānām saṃtāpam prati hetu tve tulya kāla tvena upanibandhaḥ
śleṣa bhittikā bheda adhyavasāya rūpā yathā
astam bhāsvān prayātaḥ saha ripubhiḥ ayam balāni
atra astam gamanam śliṣṭam
astam ityasya ubhaya artha tvāt
upamāna ityādi
kiṃhetukam ca atra bheda prādhānyam iti āśaṅkya āha guṇa ityādi
guṇa prādhāna bhāvaḥ pi kiṃhetukaḥ iti āha saha artha ityādi
ekasya pradhānya bhūta vibhakti nirdeśāt anyasya ca vidhi vibhakti nirdeśāt
vaivakṣikam iti na punarvāstavam
upamāna upameya tvam hi dvayoḥ tulya kakṣa tve bhavati tat ca atra kiṃnimittakam itthā āśaṅkya āha saha artha ityādi
pariśiṣṭasya iti prathama antasya
śābdaḥ iti na punar ārthaḥ
vastutas viparyayasya api saṃbhavāt
evam guṇa pradhāna bhāva nimittakam bheda prādhānyam api śābdam eva atra jñeyam

tasmāt śrābdam eva bheda prādhānyam āśritya iha asyāḥ vacanam
viparyayaḥ iti

analyzed: kṣayam eti sā varākī snehaṃna samam tvadīyena iti asya ardham

original: karmasāhitye yathā - 'dyujano mutyunā sārdhaṃ yasyājau tārakāmaye /

yathā

original: 'utkṣitpaṃ saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sārdhaṃ mukhairnāmitaṃ bhūpānāṃ janakasya saṃśayadhiyā sākaṃ samāsphālitam /
analyzed: utkṣitpam saha kauśikasya pulakaiḥ sārdham mukhaiḥ nāmitam bhūpānām janakasya saṃśaya dhiyā sākam samāsphālitam

original: vaidehyā manasā samaṃ ca sahasākṛṣṭaṃ tato bhārgava- prauḍhāhaṅkṛtikandalena ca samaṃ tad bhagnamaiśaṃ dhanuḥ' // @--------------------
analyzed: vaidehyā manasā samam ca sahasā ākṛṣṭam tatas bhārgava prauḍha ahaṅkṛti kandalena ca samam tat bhagnam aiśam dhanuḥ  /

etāni iti samanantara uktāni
yama apekṣayā dyu janasya anantaram ātpa manoratha tvam iti ādi paścāt bhāvena kramikayoḥ tulya kālatvena uktiḥ
yathā vā
bhāgyaiḥ samam samutpannam prajābhiḥ saha lālitam
vardhitam sukṛtaiḥ sārdham arṇorājam asūta sā
atra samutpatti anantaram tad bhāgyānām utpattiḥ iti kramikayoḥ sama kāla tvam
asyāḥ ca śuddha sāmānya rūpa tvam yathā

vardhante śvāsa nikurambāḥ
atra saurabha parimalayoḥ śuddha sāmānya rūpa tvam
bimba pratibimba bhāvaḥ yathā
dina ara araṇi uraṃbā kaṇaā alakaḍa areṇi vipphuriā
viaśanti samam
dinakara kara nikurambā kanakācala kaṭaka reṇu visphuritāḥ
vikasanti parimala bhara udbhaṭaiḥ kamala ākaraiḥ sārdham
atra kanakācala kaṭaka reṇu vicchurita tvasya parimala bhara udbhaṭa tvam bimba pratibimba tvena nirdiṣṭam
start sūtra
saha utki pratibhaṭa bhūtām vinoktim lakṣayati
vinā kiñcid anyasya sat asat tva abhāvaḥ vinā uktiḥ
sattvasya śobhana tvasya abhāvaḥ śobhana tvam
evam asattvasya aśobhana tvasya abhāvaḥ śobhana tvam

original: tedve sattvāsattve yatra kasyacidasaṃnidhānānnibadhyete sā dvidhā vinoktiḥ /
analyzed: sattva asattve yatra kasyacid asaṃnidhānāt nibadhyete sā dvidhā vinā uktiḥ
atra ca śobhana tva aśobhana tva sattā sattāyām eva vaktavyāyām asattā mukhena abhidhānam anya nivṛtti prayuktā tad nivṛttiḥ iti khyāpana artham
evam ca anya anivṛttau vidhiḥ eva prakāśitaḥ bhavati
ādyā yathā

original: 'vinayena vinā kā śrīḥ kā niśā śaśinā vinā /
analyzed: vinayena vinā kā śrīḥ kā niśā śaśinā vinā
rahitā sat kavi tvena kīdṛśī vāc vidagdha tā
pratibhaṭa bhūtām iti pratipakṣa bhūtām
atas eva etad anantaram etat lakṣaṇam
tat eva aha vinā akiñcit tyādi
etat eva vyācaṣṭe sattvasya ityādinā
kasyacid iti yatra yādṛśaḥ vivakṣitaḥ tasya iti

original: nanu cātra sattvāsattvayorvidhimukhenaiva vācyatve kimiti pratītivaiṣamyadāyinā niṣedhamukhena nirdeśaḥ kṛta ityāśadvayāha-atra cetyādi /
analyzed: nanu ca atra sattva asattvayoḥ vidhi mukhena eva vācya tve kim iti pratīti vaiṣamya dāyinā niṣedha mukhena nirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ iti āśat vayāha atra ca ityādi
tad śabdena sattva asattvayoḥ pratyavamarśaḥ
anya nivṛtti prayuktena tad nivṛtti lyāpanena api kim bhavati iti āśaṅkya āha evam ca ityādinā
anyasya kasyacid anivṛttau sattam asattvam eva vā bhavati iti arthaḥ
ādyā iti asattva nibandhana uktiḥ
kā śrīḥ na kācid śrīḥ iti śriyaḥ sadbhāvaḥ
vinaya asadbhāve sti iti etat abhidhānam śriyaḥ sattve paryavasyati iti vinaya nivṛtti prayuktam śriyaḥ sattvam uktam

original: evaṃ vinayasyānivṛttau śriyaḥ sattva eva vidhiḥ prakāśito bhavatīti vinaya evaṃ bharabandhaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: evam vinayasya anivṛttau śriyaḥ sattve eva vidhiḥ prakāśitaḥ bhavati iti vinayaḥ evam bhara bandhaḥ kāryaḥ
evam anyatra api jñeyam
anye ca atra vāstava tvam manyamānāḥ

original: 'tasyāḥ śaityaṃ vinā jyotsnā puṣparddhiḥ saurabhaṃ vinā /
analyzed: tasyāḥ śaityam vinā jyotsnā puṣparddhiḥ saurabham vinā
vinā uṣṇa tvam ca hutabhuj tvām vinā pratibhāsate
iti atra vinā ukti alaṅkāra tvam āhuḥ

original: atra hi jyotstrādīnāṃ śaityādinā nityamavibhāve 'pi vinābhāva upanibaddhaḥ /
analyzed: atra hi jyotstra ādīnām śaitya ādinā nityam avibhāve vinābhāvaḥ upanibaddhaḥ
yat āha alaṅkāra bhāṣyakāraḥ vinā uktiḥ iti vinā ukti rūpa saṃkhyā asyate iti
granthakṛtā punar iyam cirantana lakṣi tattvāt lakṣitā

original: atra vināśabdamantareṇāpi vinārthavivakṣā yathākathañcinnimittībhavati yathā sahoktau sahārthavivakṣā /
analyzed: atra vinā śabdam antareṇa api vinā artha vivakṣā yathā kathañcid nimittībhavati yathā saha uktau saha artha vivakṣā
evam ca

original: 'nirarthakaṃ janma gataṃ nalinyā yathā na dṛṣṭaṃ tuhināṃśubimbam /
analyzed: nirarthakam janma gatam nalinyāḥ yathā na dṛṣṭam tuhināṃśu bimbam

original: utpattirindorapi niṣphalaiva na yena dṛṣṭā nalinī prabuddhā' //
analyzed: utpattiḥ indoḥ api niṣphalā eva na yena dṛṣṭā nalinī prabuddhā
ityādau vinā uktiḥ eva

iyam ca paraspara vinokti bhaṅgyā camatkāra atiśaya kṛt
yathā udāhṛte viṣaye
yathā kathañcid iti

original: yadyapi yathā sahaśabdaṃ vināpi sahārye tṛtīyāsti tathā vināśabdaṃvināpi dvitīyādīnāṃ vinārthe sadbhāvo 'sti,

vivṛṇvatā saurabha rora doṣam bandi vratam varṇa guṇaiḥ spṛśantyā

original: vikasvare kasya na karṇikāre ghrāṇena dṛṣṭervavṛdhe vivādaḥ' //
analyzed: vikasvare kasya na karṇikāre ghrāṇena dṛṣṭeḥ vavṛdhe vivādaḥ

original: atra ghrāṇena saheti tatprayogaṃ vinā tatpratītāveva viśrānte /

evam ca iti

original: 'haṃsaṇa sarehiṃ viṇā sarāṇa sohāviṇā ṇa haṃsehiṃ /
analyzed: haṃsaṇa sarehiṃ viṇā sarāṇa sohā viṇā ṇa haṃsehiṃ

original: aṇṇoṇṇaṃ cia ee appāṇaṃ ṇavaraṃ garuenti' //
analyzed: aṇṇoṇṇam cia ee appāṇam ṇavaram

original: ('haṃsānāṃ sarobhirvanā sarasāṃ śobhā vinā ca haṃsaiḥ /
analyzed: haṃsānām sarobhiḥ vanā sarasām śobhā vinā ca haṃsaiḥ
anyonyam ca eva ete ātmānam kevalam garayanti
dvitīyā yathā

start sūtra
adhunā viśeṣaṇa vicchitti āśrayeṇa alaṅkāra dvayam ucyate
tatra ādau viśeṣaṇa sāmya avaṣṭambhena samāsoktim āha
viśeṣaṇānām sāmyāt aprastutasya gamya tve samāsoktiḥ

original: iha prastutāprastutānāṃ kvacid vācyatvaṃ kvacid gamyatvamiti dvaividhyam /
analyzed: iha prastuta aprastutānām kvacid vācya tvam kvacid gamya tvam iti dvaividhyam

original: vācyatvaṃ ca śleṣanirdeśabhaṅgyā pṛthagupādānena vetyapi dvaividhyam /
analyzed: vācya tvam ca śleṣa nirdeśa bhaṅgyā pṛthak upādānena vā iti api dvaividhyam
etat dvi bhedam api śleṣa alaṅkārasya viṣayaḥ

original: gumyatvaṃ tu prastutaniṣṭhamaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayaḥ aprastutaniṇṭhaṃ tu samāsoktiviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: gumya tvam tu prastuta niṣṭham aprastuta praśaṃsā viṣayaḥ aprastuta niṇṭham tu samāsokti viṣayaḥ
tatra ca nimittam viśeṣaṇa sāmyam
viśeṣyasya api sāmye śleṣa prātpeḥ
viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt hi pratīyamāna prastutam prastuta avacchedaka tvena pratīyate
rūpa samārope tu avacchādita tvena prakṛtasya tad rūpi tvāt rūpakam eva
tatra iti alāṃra dvaya madhyāt
ādau iti pradhāna tayā
asyāḥ hi viśeṣaṇa mātra avaṣṭabhbhāt parikarāt viśeṣaṇa sāmya avaṣṭambha tvena viśiṣṭa tvam
viśeṣaṇa ityādi
attyāḥ ca alaṅkāra antarebhyaḥ vibhāgam darśayitum upakramate iha ityādinā

original: vācyatvaṃ cātra dvayoḥ prastutayoraprastutayoḥ prastutāprastutayośca bhavati /
analyzed: vācya tvam ca atra dvayoḥ prastutayoḥ aprastutayoḥ prastuta aprastutayoḥ ca bhavati
gamya tvam punar kvacid prastutasya kvacid ca aprastutasya
prastuta aprastutayoḥ tu na bhavati
tādrūpyeṇa vastu sadbhāva abhāvāt
śleṣa nirdiśa bhaṅgyā iti
prastutayoḥ aprastutayoḥ ca
pṛthak upādānena iti
prastutayoḥ aprastutayoḥ prastuta aprastutayoḥ ca etat iti vācyam
atra ca aprastutasya kiṃhetukam gamya tvam iti aṅkya āha tatra ca ityādi
tatra iti aprastutasya gamya tve

original: viśeṣaṇānāṃ cātra bahutvameva vivakṣitamiti na vācyam /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇānām ca atra bahu tvam eva vivakṣitam iti na vācyam
śvasana viṣamā rārtriḥ jyotstnā taraṅgita vibhramā śaśimaṇi bhuvaḥ padminī

original: upacitatamonohā bhūmirvyanakti vivarṇatāṃ taditi gahane darśaṃ darśaṃ kathaṃ sakhi jīvyate' //
analyzed: upacita tamaḥ nohā bhūmiḥ vyanakti vivarṇa tām tat iti gahane darśam darśam katham sakhi jīvyate
iti atra viśeṣaṇa bahutva abhāve pi samāsokteḥ sadbhāvāt
atas ca viśeṣaṇānām sāmya ādi iti na sūtraṇīyam
a bahu tve tasya avyāpteḥ
viśeṣaṇa sāmyam api kasmāt atra hetu tvam bhajate iti āśaṅkya āha viśeṣeṇa ityādi
aprastutam iti na punar aprastuta dharmāḥ eva
na hi anya dharmi saṃbandhinaḥ dharmāḥ svadharmiṇam antareṇa anyatra avatiṣṭante
na hi anāyake nāyaka dharmāṇām anvayaḥ yujyate
anya dharmāṇām anvaya trā anvaya asaṃbhavāt

original: ata evānyaropyamāṇo 'nyavahāro 'nyatra na saṃbhavatīti tadavinābhāvātsvavyavahāriṇamākṣipatītyākṣipyamāṇenāprastutena dharmiṇaiva prastuto  #
analyzed: atas eva anya ropyamāṇaḥ nyavahāraḥ nyatra na saṃbhavati iti tad avinābhāvāt svavyavahāriṇam ākṣipati iti ākṣipyamāṇena aprastutena dharmiṇā eva prastutaḥ
punar ācchrādyate

original: tathātve hyaprastutena prastutasya rūparūpitatvādrūpasamāropaḥ syānna vyavahārasamāropaḥ /
analyzed: tathātve hi aprastutena prastutasya rūpa rūpita tvāt rūpa samāropaḥ syāt na vyavahāra samāropaḥ
atas eva āha prastutasya rūpa rūpita tvāt rūpa samāropaḥ syāt na vyavahāra samāropaḥ
atas eva āha prastuta avacchedaka tvena iti
atas eva aprastutasya gamya tve iti sūtritam

original: evaṃ samāsoktau vyavahārasamāropādaprastutena prastutasya vaiśiṣṭamlakṣaṇamavacchredakatvaṃ vidhayate /
analyzed: evam samāsoktau vyavahāra samāropāt aprastutena prastutasya vaiśiṣṭam lakṣaṇam avacchredaka tvam vidhayate
rūpake tu rūpa samāropāt rūpita tva ākhyam ācchrādaka tvam iti anirbhedaḥ

original: tena 'viśeṣaṇānāṃ sāmyādaprastutadharmāvacchreda' ityapāsyāsmallakṣaṇānuguṇyenaiva viśeṣaṇasāmyādaprastutāvacchedaḥ samāsoktirityeva sūtraṇīyam
analyzed: tena viśeṣaṇānām sāmyāt aprastuta dharma avacchredaḥ iti apāsya asmad lakṣaṇa ānuguṇyena eva viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt aprastuta avacchedaḥ samāsoktiḥ iti eva sūtraṇīyam
atiśayokti āśaṅkā punar atra niṣpramāṇikā eva
viṣayasya upādānāt viṣayiṇaḥ ca anupādānāt

original: tacca viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ śliṣṭatayā sādhāraṇyenaupamyagarbhatvena ca bhavat tridhā bhavati
analyzed: tat ca viśeṣaṇa sāmyam śliṣṭa tayā sādhāraṇyena aupamya garbha tvena ca bhavat tridhā bhavati

original: tatra śliṣṭatayā yathā - 'upoḍharāgeṇa vilolatārakaṃ tathā gṛhītaṃ śaśinā niśāmukham
analyzed: tatra śliṣṭa tayā yathā upoḍha rāgeṇa vilola tārakam tathā gṛhītam śaśinā niśā mukham

original: ṣa yathā samastaṃ timirāṃśukaṃ tayā puro 'pi rāgādgalitaṃ na lakṣitam' //
analyzed: ṣa yathā samastam timira aṃśukam tayā puras pi rāgāt galitam na lakṣitam
atra niśā śaśinoḥ śliṣṭa viśeṣaṇa mahimnā nāyaka vyavahāra pratipattiḥ
a parityakta sva rūpayoḥ niśā śaśinoḥ nāyaka tā ākhya dharma viśiṣṭayoḥ pratīteḥ

original: sādhāraṇyena yathā - 'tanvī manoramā bālā lolākṣī puṣpahāsinī /
analyzed: sādhāraṇyena yathā tanvī manoramā bālā lola akṣī puṣpa hāsinī
vikāsam eti subhaga bhavat darśana mātrataḥ
atra tanvī ityādi viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt lola akṣyāḥ latā vyavahāra pratītiḥ
tatra ca latā eka gāmi vikāsa ākhya dharma sa sa āropaḥ kāraṇam
anyathā viśeṣaṇa sāmya mātreṇa niyata latā vyavahārasya apratīteḥ
vikāsaḥ ca prakṛte upacaritaḥ jñeyaḥ
evam ca kārya samārope jñeyā
iyam ca samāsoktiḥ pūrva apekṣayā aspaṣṭā
tat iti aprastutasya gamya tve nimittam
tatra iti nirdhāraṇe
nāyaka iti sarūpayoḥ ekaśeṣaḥ
a parityakta svarūpayoḥ iti
rūpa rūpita tve hi parityaktam sva svarūpam syāt
tatra iti
latā vyavahāra pratītau

original: nanu yadi lataikagamyeva vikāsākhyo dharmastatkathaṃ prakṛte saṃgacchata ityāśaṅkyāha-vikāsa ityādi /
analyzed: nanu yadi latā eka gamyā iva vikāsa ākhyaḥ dharmaḥ tat katham prakṛte saṃgacchate iti āśaṅkya āha vikāsaḥ ityādi
etat eva anyatra api yojayati evam ityādinā

original: tadevaṃ sādhāraṇyena samāsokterviśeṣaṇasāmye satyapyaprakṛtasaṃbandhi dharmakāryaṃsamāropamantareṇa tadvayavahārapratītirna bhavatīti siddham
analyzed: tat evam sādhāraṇyena samāsokteḥ viśeṣaṇa sāmye sati api aprakṛta saṃbandhi dharma kāryam samāropam antareṇa tad vayavahāra pratītiḥ na bhavati iti siddham
aupamya garbha tvena yathā
danta prabhā puṣpa citā pāṇi pallava śobhinī
keśapāśa ali vṛndena su veṣā hariṇa īkṣaṇā

original: atra dantaprabhā puṣpāṇīveti suveṣatvavaśādupamāgarbhatvena kṛte samāse paścāddantaprabhāsadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiściteti samāsāntarāśrayaṇena samānaviśeṣaṇamāhātmyāllatāvyavahārapratītiḥ
analyzed: atra danta prabhā puṣpāṇi iva iti su veṣa tva vaśāt upamā garbha tvena kṛte samāse paścāt danta prabhā sadṛśaiḥ puṣpaiḥ citā iti samāsa antara āśrayaṇena samāna viśeṣaṇa māhātmyāt latā vyavahāra pratītiḥ

original: atraiva 'parītā hariṇekṣaṇā' iti pāṭhe upamārūpasādhakabāghakābhāvāt saṃkarasamāśrayeṇa kṛte yojane paścāt pūrvavat samāsāntaramahimnā latāpratītijñaṃyā
analyzed: atra eva parītāḥ hariṇa īkṣaṇāḥ iti pāṭhe upamā rūpa sādhaka bāghaka abhāvāt saṃkara samāśrayeṇa kṛte yojane paścāt pūrvavat samāsa antara mahimnā latā pratīti jñaṃyā

original: rūpakagarbhatvena tu samāsāntarāśrayaṇāt samānaviṣeṣaṇatvaṃ bhavadapi na samāsokteḥ prayojakam /
analyzed: rūpaka garbha tvena tu samāsa antara āśrayaṇāt samāna viṣeṣaṇa tvam bhavat api na samāsokteḥ prayojakam

original: dhārānipātaiḥ saha kiṃ nu vāntaścandro 'yamitpārtataraṃ rarāsa' //
analyzed: dhārā nipātaiḥ saha kim nu vāntaḥ candraḥ yam id pārtataram rarāsa

original: atra nirīkṣaṇānuguṇyādvidyunnayanairiti rūpake payodasya draṣṭṛpuruṣanirūpaṇamārtataraṃ rarāsetyatra pratīyamānotprekṣāyā nimittatvaṃ bhajate
analyzed: atra nirīkṣaṇa ānuguṇyāt vidyut nayanaiḥ iti rūpake payodasya draṣṭṛ puruṣa nirūpaṇam ārtataram rarāsa iti atra pratīyamāna utprekṣāyāḥ nimitta tvam bhajate
śliṣṭam yathā
madana gaṇanā sthāne lekhya prapañcam udañcayan vicakila bṛhat pattra nyasta dvirepha maṣī lavaiḥ

original: kuṭilalipibhiḥ kaṃ kāyasthaṃ na nāma visūtrayan vyadhita virahiprāṇeṣvāyavyayāvadhikaṃ madhuḥ' [śrī. ca. 670] //
analyzed: kuṭila lipibhiḥ kam kāyastham na nāma visūtrayan vyadhita virahi prāṇeṣu āya vyayau adhikam madhuḥ śrī ca

original: atra hi pattralipikāyasthaśabdeṣu śleṣagarbhe rūpakaṃ dvirephamaṣīlavairityetadrūpakanimittam /

original: asya ca pracuraḥ prayogaviṣaya iti na samāsoktibuddhiḥ kāryā / @--------------------
analyzed: asya ca pracuraḥ prayoga viṣayaḥ iti na samāsokti buddhiḥ kāryā

original: suveṣatvaṃ prakṛtārthaṃ evānuguṇamityupamāyāḥ sādhakam ataśca tatsamāsāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: su veṣa tvam prakṛta artham eva anuguṇam iti upamāyāḥ sādhakam atas ca tad samāsa āśrayaḥ

yadi api atra upamā samāsaḥ eva sthitaḥ tathā api upamāna upameyayoḥ vyatyayāt eva samāsa antara tvam uktam
