atra eva iti dantaprabhā ityādau
upamā rūpaka sādhaka bādhaka abhāvāt iti
hi prakṛta aprakṛtayoḥ tathā na ānuguṇyam iti sādhaka tva abhāvaḥ
tathā ca na viguṇa tvam iti bādhaka tva abhāvaḥ
atas ca eka pakṣa āśraya abhāvāt upamā rūpakayoḥ saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ
tasya samāśraye ubhaya samāsa grahaṇam

original: taccaikasminneva vākye na saṃbhavatīti kāmakṣāreṇa tayorgrahaṇam /
analyzed: tat ca ekasmin eva vākye na saṃbhavati iti kāma kṣāreṇa tayoḥ grahaṇam
saṃkara samāśrayeṇa api upamā samāsayā uccane kṛte yadvat ayam eva alaṅkāraḥ tadvat rūpaka samāsayoḥ jane kim atham eva kim uta alaṅkāra antaram iti āśaṅkya āha rūpaka ityādi
sākṣāt api rūpaka garbhe samāse yojyam
samāna nyāya tvāt
yadi evam tarjhupamā samāśraye pi eka deśa vivarti upamā mukhena eva artha antara pratīteḥ kim nā etat bhavati iti āśaṅkya āha na ca ityādi
eṣaḥ iti rūpaka uktaḥ
abhāvāt iti udbhaṭa matena
yat āhuḥ
na ca rudraṭasya iva udbhaṭasya eka deśa vivarti rūpaka vat upamā saṃkarau ekadeśinau staḥ atas ca etat tad mata abhiprāyeṇa uktam
granthakṛt mate hi vakṣyamāṇa nītyā tayoḥ saṃbhavaḥ

original: nanu yadi tayorgranthakṛnmate saṃbhavastadaupamyagarbhaviśeṣaṇotthāpitaḥ samāsoktiprakārastarhi na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: nanu yadi tayoḥ granthakṛt mate saṃbhavaḥ tadā aupamya garbha viśeṣaṇa utthāpitaḥ samāsokti prakāraḥ tarhi na saṃbhavati
tasya eka deśa vivarti rūpaka vat eka deśa vivartibhyām upamā saṃkarābhyām eva artha antara pratīti siddheḥ vaiyarthyāt
na etat
yatas sti eva tāvat aupamya garbha viśeṣaṇa hetuka tvam samāsokteḥ

original: kintvetadanyabhedasahacaritamevāsyā nimittatāṃ bhajate na punaḥ kevalam /
analyzed: kintu etat anya bheda sahacaritam eva asyāḥ nimitta tām bhajate na punar kevalam

original: tathātve hi viśeṣaṇānāmaupamyagarbhatve ekadeśavivartinyā upamāyāḥ prātpiḥ /
analyzed: tathātve hi viśeṣaṇānām aupamya garbha tve eka deśa vivartinyāḥ upamāyāḥ
tatra śliṣṭa tva sahacaritam etat yathā
paripiñjarita asita ambaraiḥ nibiḍaiḥ kam na haranti hāribhiḥ
ayi sāyam imāḥ payodharaiḥ sphuṭa rāgāḥ cala tārakāḥ diśaḥ
atra sphuṭa saṃdhyā ātapa kuṅkumaiḥ iti pāṭhe saṃdhyā ātapa kuṅkumaiḥ iti aupamya garbham viśeṣaṇam
sādhāraṇya sahacaritam yathā
vikāsam eti subhaga bhavat darśana mātrataḥ
atra stabaka stanī iti aupamya garbham viśeṣaṇam
śuddha kārya samāropa sahacaritam yathā
samāruroha upari pādapānām luloṭha puṣpa utkara reṇu puñje

original: latāprasūnāṃśukamācakarṣaṃ krīḍanvane kiṃ na cakāra caitraḥ' //
analyzed: latā prasūna aṃśukam ācakarṣam krīḍan vane kim na cakāra caitraḥ
atra prasūna aṃśukam iti aupabhya garbha viśeṣaṇam
kevala tve punar eteṣām eka deśa vivartinī upamā eva yathā
babhau lola adhara dala sphurat daśana kesaram
bhrū vilāsa ali valayam lalitam lalanā mukham
atra lalita tvam upamā sādhakam

original: samāsāntarāśrayāt samānaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ bhavadapi nātra samāsokteḥ prayojakam /
analyzed: samāsa antara āśrayāt samāna viśeṣaṇa tvam bhavat api nā atra samāsokteḥ prayojakam
eka deśa vivarti upamā mukhena eva artha antara pratīteḥ tasyāḥ vaicathyāt
evam dantaprabhā ityādau api jñeyam

original: dantaprabhāḥ puṣpāṇīvetyeva samāse kṛte upamānabhūtāyā latāyāḥ pratītisiddheḥ samāsāntarāśrayeṇāgatāyāstatpratītervyarthatvāt /
analyzed: danta prabhāḥ puṣpāṇi iva iti eva samāse kṛte upamāna bhūtāyāḥ latāyāḥ pratīti siddheḥ samāsa antara āśrayeṇa āgatāyāḥ tad pratīteḥ vyartha tvāt

original: aprakṛtāgūraṇe hi kaveḥ saṃrambhaḥ taccānayaiva siddhamiti kiṃ samāsoktyā /
analyzed: aprakṛta āgūraṇe hi kaveḥ saṃrambhaḥ tat ca anayā eva siddham iti kim samāsoktyā
cirantana anurodhāt punar atra granthakṛtā asamāsa uktiḥ uktā

original: yattu 'yatra samāsoktāyāmupamāyāṃ samāsāntareṇa viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ yojayituṃ śakyaṃ tatraupamyagarbhaviśeṣaṇaprabhāvitā samāsoktiruktā' iti vakṣyati  #
analyzed: yat tu yatra samāsa uktāyām upamāyām samāsa antareṇa viśeṣaṇa sāmyam yojayitum śakyam tatra aupamya garbha viśeṣaṇa prabhāvitā samāsoktiḥ uktā iti vakṣyati
tat api cirantana anurodha param eva

original: anyathā hi samānanyāyatvādekadeśavivartini rūpake 'pi yatra samānaviśeṣaṇatvaṃ yojayituṃ śakyaṃ tatrāpi samāsoktiriti kiṃ noktam /
analyzed: anyathā hi samāna nyāya tvāt eka deśa vivartini rūpake yatra samāna viśeṣaṇa tvam yojayitum śakyam tatra api samāsoktiḥ iti kim nā uktam
yat tu na uktam tat yuktam
rūpaka māhātmyāt prathamam eva tad pratīti siddheḥ antaram samāsokti mukhena a prakṛti īteḥ vaiyarthyāt
āhlādi candra vadanā sphurat tāraka mauktikā
ghana andhakāra dhammillā rājate gagana sthalī

original: ityādau punarupamāyāḥ sādhakābhāvādekadeśavivarti rūpakameveti na samāsoktibhramaḥ kāryaḥ /
analyzed: ityādau punar upamāyāḥ sādhaka abhāvāt eka deśa vivarti rūpakam eva iti na samāsokti bhramaḥ kāryaḥ
na ca evamādau upamā rūpakayoḥ saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ nyāyyaḥ
tasya alaṅkārasāra kāra ādibhiḥ nirākṛta tvāt
samāsokti lakṣaṇau alasare kim rūpaka nirūpaṇena iti āśaṅkya āha asyāḥ ityādi
asyāḥ ca yathā uparāditān bhedān saṃkalayati tat evam ityādinā
tat evam śliṣṭa viśeṣaṇa samutthāpitā ekā
sādhāraṇa viśeṣaṇa samutthāpitā tu dharma kārya samāropābhyām dvi bhedā
aupamya garbha viśeṣaṇa samutthāpita upamā saṃkara samāsābhyām dvi bhedā
rūpaka samāśrayeṇa tu bheda dvayam asyāḥ na viṣayaḥ
tat evam pañca prakārā samāsoktiḥ

original: iyaṃ ca śuddhakāryasamāropeṇa viśeṣaṇasāmyenobhayamayatvena prathamaṃ tridhā samāsoktiḥ /
analyzed: iyam ca śuddha kārya samāropeṇa viśeṣaṇa sāmyena ubhaya maya tvena prathamam tridhā samāsoktiḥ
viśeṣaṇa sāmyam ca pañca prakāram nirṇītam
sarvatra ca atra vyavahāra samāropaḥ eva jīvitam
sa ca laukike vastuni laukika vastu vyavahāra samāropaḥ
śāstrīye vastuni śāstrīya vastu vyavahāra samāropaḥ
laukike vā śāstrīya vastu vyavahāra samāropaḥ

original: śāstrīye vā laukikavastuvyavahāramāropa iti caturdhā bhavati /
analyzed: śāstrīye vā laukika vastu vyavahāram āropaḥ iti caturdhā bhavati
tat evam bahu prakārā samāsoktiḥ

na viṣaye iti
yathā ukta upapatteḥ rūpake eva viśrānteḥ

uktam punar prakāra pañcakam asyāḥ avāntarabheda rūpam

original: yadyapi śuddhakāryasamārope 'pi viśeṣaṇasāmyabhevāsti tathāpyatra śuddha eva kāryasamāropa udbhiktatayā pratīyata iti tasya pṛthagmedatvamuktam
analyzed: yadi api śuddha kārya samārope tathā api atra śuddhaḥ eva kārya samāropaḥ udbhikta tayā pratīyate iti tasya pṛthak meda tvam uktam

bahu prakārā iti

original: 'vilikhati kucāvuccairgāḍhaṃ karoti kacagrahaṃ likhati lalite vaktre pattrāvalīmasamañjasām /

original: kṣitipa khadiraḥ śroṇībimbād vikarṣati cāṃśukaṃ marubhuvi haṭhāt trasyantīnāṃ tavārimṛgīdṛśām' //
analyzed: kṣitipa khadiraḥ śroṇī bimbāt vikarṣati ca aṃśukam maru bhuvi haṭhāt trasyantīnām tava ari mṛgī dṛśām

udāhṛtam iti upoḍha rāgeṇa ityādinā
ubhaya maya tvena yathā

original: 'nirlūnānyalakāni pāṭitamuraḥ kṛtsno 'dharaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ karṇe rugjanitā kṛtaṃ ca nayane nīlābjakānte kṣatam /
analyzed: nirlūnāni alakāni pāṭitam uraḥ kṛtsnaḥ dharaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ karṇe ruj janitā kṛtam ca nayane nīla abja kānte kṣatam

original: yāntīnāmatisaṃbhramākulapadanyāsaṃ marau nīrasaiḥ kiṃ kiṃ kaṇṭakibhiḥ kṛtaṃ na tarubhistvadvairivāmabhruvām' //
analyzed: yāntīnām ati saṃbhrama ākula padanyāsam marau nīrasaiḥ kim kim kaṇṭakibhiḥ kṛtam na tarubhiḥ tvad vairi vāma bhruvām

yathā
dyām āliliṅga mukham āśu diśām cucumba ruddha ambarām śaśi kalām alikhat kara agraiḥ

original: antarnimagracarapuṣpaśaro 'titāpāt kiṃ kiṃ cakāra taruṇo na yadīkṣaṇāgniḥ' //

original: lopaḥ kṛtaḥ kila paratvajuṣo vibhakte- stairlakṣaṇaṃ tava kṛtaṃ dhruvameva manye' //

original: 'sīmānaṃ na jagāma yannayanayornānyena yatsaṃgataṃ na spṛṣṭaṃ vacasā kadācidapi yad dṛṣṭopamānaṃ na yat /
analyzed: sīmānam na jagāma yat nayanayoḥ na anyena yat saṃgatam na spṛṣṭam vacasā kadācid api yat dṛṣṭa upamānam na yat

original: arthādāpatitaṃ na yanna ca na yattatkiñcideṇīdṛśāṃ lāvaṇyaṃ jayati pramāṇarahitaṃ cetaścamatkārakam' //

original: 'gaṇḍānte madadantināṃ prahṛrataḥ kṣmāmaṇḍale vaidhṛte rakṣāmācarataḥ sadā vidadhato lāṭeṣu yātrotsavam /

original: pūrvāmatyajataḥ sthitiṃ śubhakarīmāsevyamānasya te vardhante vijayaśriyaḥ kimiva na śreyasvināṃ maṅgalam' //
analyzed: pūrvām atyajataḥ sthitim śubha karīm āsevyamānasya te vardhante vijaya śriyaḥ kim iva na śreyasvinām maṅgalam
atra jyotiḥśāstra prasiddha vastu samāropaḥ

original: 'prasarpattātparyairapi sadanumānaikarasikai- rapi jñeyo no yaḥ parimitagatitvaṃ parijahṛt /

original: budhairityavasito na vācyo no lakṣyastava sahṛdayasyo guṇagaṇaḥ' //
analyzed: budhaiḥ iti avasitaḥ na vācyaḥ no lakṣyaḥ tava sahṛdayasyaḥ guṇa gaṇaḥ
atra bharata ādi śāstra prasiddha vastu samāropaḥ

original: tatra śuddhakāryasamārope kāryasya viśeṣaṇatvamaupacārikamāśritya viśeṣaṇasāmyāditi lakṣaṇaṃ pūrvaśāstrānusāreṇa vihitaṃ yathākathañcid yojyam

original: taditthaṃ saprapañcāṃ samāsoktiṃ pratipādya punarapi sahṛdayānāṃ hṛdayaṅgamīkartuṃ granthakṛdetatpratīrti vibhāgena lakṣye yojayati-iha tvityādinā
analyzed: tat ittham sa prapañcām samāsoktim pratipādya punar api sahṛdayānām hṛdayaṅgamīkartum granthakṛt etad prati īrti vibhāgena lakṣye yojayati iha tu ityādinā
iha tu
aindram dhanuḥ pāṇḍu payodhareṇa śarad dadhānā ārdra nakha kṣata ābham

iti atra asti tāvat ravi śaśinoḥ nāyaka tva pratītiḥ
na ca atra viśeṣaṇa sāmyam iti sā kutastyā
prasādayantī sa kalaṅkam indum iti viśeṣaṇa sāmyāt śaradaḥ nāyikā tva pratītau tad unuguṇyāt

original: tayoḥ samāsoktyā nāyakatvapratītiriti cet ārdranakhakṣatābhamaindraṃ dhanurdadhānetyetadviśeṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: tayoḥ samāsoktyā nāyaka tva pratītiḥ iti ced ārdra nakha kṣata ābham aindram dhanuḥ dadhānā iti etat viśeṣaṇam
katham sāmyena nirdriṣṭam

original: atrocyate-ekadeśavivartinyupamā yadi pratipadaṃ noktā tat sā kena pratiṣiddhā /

original: athātra nopamānatvena nāyakaḥ svasvarūpeṇa pratīyate apitu raviśaśinorevanāyakatvapratītiḥ /
analyzed: atha atra na upamāna tvena nāyakaḥ sva svarūpeṇa pratīyate api tu ravi śaśinoḥ eva nāyaka tva pratītiḥ

original: tadatrārdranakhakṣatābhamityatra sthitamapi śrutyopamānatvaṃ vastuparyālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi saṃcāraṇīyam,
analyzed: tat atra ārdra nakha kṣata ābham iti atra sthitam api śrutyā upamāna tvam vastu paryālocanayā aindre dhanuṣi saṃcāraṇīyam

original: yathā 'dadhnā juhoti' ityādau dadhni saṃcaryate vidhiḥ /
analyzed: yathā dadhnā juhoti ityādau dadhni saṃcaryate vidhiḥ

original: iha punaḥ ityatra saraḥśriyāṃ nāyikātvapratītirna samāsoktyā,
analyzed: iha punar iti atra saraḥ śriyām nāyikā tva pratītiḥ na samāsoktyā

gati antara asaṃbhavāt
yaiḥ tu nā uktā teṣām api upasaṃkhyeyā eva

original: yatra tu 'keśapāśālivṛndena' ityādau samāsoktāyāmupamāyāṃ samāsantariṇa viśeṣaṇasāmyaṃ yojayituṃ śakyaṃ tatraupamyagarbhaviśeṣaṇaprabhāvitā  #
analyzed: yatra tu keśapāśāli vṛndena ityādau samāsa uktāyām upamāyām viśeṣaṇa sāmyam yojayitum śakyam tatra aupamya garbha viśeṣaṇa prabhāvi tā
samāsoktiḥ evā iti na virodhaḥ kaścid
a vipratipatti dyotana arthaḥ tāvat śrabdaḥ
kutastyā iti

katham iti

upamāna upameyayoḥ sādharmye bheda abheda tulya tve upamā iti
evam eka deśa vivarti upamāsām arythāt eva atra nāyakaka tva pratītiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
atha iti pakṣa antare

original: yadi cātra pūrvoktayuktyaivānuguṇyād raviśaśinoḥ samāsoktimukhena nāyakatvapratītistadārdranakhakṣatābhamiti viśeṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ sāmyena yojayituṃ  #
analyzed: yadi ca atra pūrvokta yuktyā eva ānuguṇyāt ravi śaśinoḥ samāsokti mukhena nāyaka tva pratītiḥ tadā ārdra nakha kṣata ābham iti viśeṣaṇam katham sāmyena yojayitum
śakyam iti āśaṅkya āha tat atra ityādi
etat eva śāstra antara prasiddha dṛṣṭānta mukhena hṛdayaṅgamīkaroti yathā ityādinā
agnihotram juhuyāt iti anena utpatti vidhi vākyena hi homaḥ vihitaḥ

original: tasya ca punarvidhānamadagdhadahananyāyena yāvadaprātpaṃ tāvad vidherviṣaya ityabhyupagamātra yujyata iti tatrāpyuktatvādupapade dadhni saṃcāryata  #
analyzed: tasya ca punar vidhānam adagdha dahana nyāyena yāvat aprātpam tāvat vidheḥ viṣayaḥ iti abhyupagamāt atra yujyate iti tatra api ukta tvāt upapade dadhni saṃcāryata
iti arthaḥ

yaiḥ iti udbhaṭa ādibhiḥ

original: sā ca samāroktirarthāntaranyāse kacitsamarthyagatatvena kacitsamarthakagatatvena ca bhavati /

strī cintā kā manasvinaḥ

original: anākramya jagat sarve no saṃdhyāṃ bhajate raviḥ' //
analyzed: an ākramya jagat sarve na u saṃdhyām bhajate raviḥ

original: atropagūḍhatvena śāntataḍitkaṭākṣatvena ca śaśāṅkaśaradornāyakavyavahārapratītau samāsoktyāliṅgita evārtho viśeṣarūpaḥ sāmānyāśrayeṇārthāntaranyāsena  #

samarthyate
sāmānyasya ca atra śleṣa vaśāt utthānam
śānta taḍit kaṭākṣa iti aupamya garbhe viśeṣaṇam samāsa antara āśrayeṇa atra samānam

original: asamātpetyādau tu strīśabdasya sāmānyena strītvamātrābhidhānāt sāmānyarūpo 'rtho
analyzed: tu strī śabdasya sāmānyena strī tva mātra abhidhānāt sāmānya rūpaḥ
liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśa garbheṇa kārya apanibandhanena utthāpitayā samāsoktyā samāropita nāyaka vyavahāreṇa
ravi saṃdhyā vṛttāntena viśeṣa rūpeṇa samarthyate
ākṛṣṭi vega vigalat bhujaga indra bhoga nimoka paṭṭa pariveṣa tayā amburāśeḥ
mantha vyathā vyupaśama artham iva āśu yasya mandākinī ciraveṣṭata pāda mūle

original: atra nirmokapaṭṭāpahnavena samāropitāyā mandākinyā yadvastuvṛttena pādamūle veṣṭanaṃ taccaraṇamūle veṣṭanatvena śleṣamūlayātiśayoktyādhyavasīyate
analyzed: atra nirmoka paṭṭa apahnavena samāropitāyāḥ mandākinyāḥ yat vastu vṛttena pāda mūle veṣṭanam tat caraṇa mūle veṣṭana tvena śleṣa mūlayā atiśayoktyā adhyavasīyate
tat tathā adhyavasitam mantha vyathā vyupaśama artham iva iti utprekṣām utthāpayati
sā utthāpyamānā eva amburāśi mandākinyoḥ pati patnī vyavahāra āśrayām samāsoktim garbhīkaroti
evam ca utprekṣā samāsoktyoḥ ekaḥ kālaḥ

original: evaṃ 'nakhakṣatānīva vanasthalīnām' ityatrāpi vanasthalīnāṃ nāyikāvyavahāra utprekṣāntarānupraviṣṭasamāsoktimūla eva /
analyzed: evam nakha kṣatāni iva vana sthalīnām iti atra api vana sthalīnām nāyikā vyavahāraḥ utprekṣā antara anupraviṣṭa samāsokti mūlaḥ eva
evam iyam samāsoktiḥ ananta prapañcā iti anayā diśā svayam utprekṣyā
sā iti ukta prapañcā
sāmānyasya iti aṅganā śabdasya strī tva mātra abhidhānāt
śleṣa da vaśāt iti

liṅga viśeṣa iti
ravi saṃdhyayoḥ pum strī rūpeṇa kāryam bhajana ākhyam

sā iti utprekṣā
ekaḥ kālaḥ iti

evam iti
yathā ukta gatyā iti arthaḥ
start sūtra
viśeṣaṇa vaicitrya prastāvāt asya iha nirdeśaḥ
viśeṣaṇānām sa abhiprāya tvam pratīyamāna artha garbhīkāraḥ
atas eva prasanna gambhīra pada tvāt na ayam dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ

original: evaṃ ca pratīyamānāṃśasya vācyonmukhatvātparikara iti sārthakaṃ nāma /
analyzed: evam ca pratīyamāna aṃśasya vācya unmukha tvāt parikaraḥ iti sārthakam nāma

original: 'rājño mānadhanasya kārmukabhṛto duryodhanasyāgrataḥ pratyakṣaṃ kurubāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca /
analyzed: rājñaḥ māna dhanasya kārmuka bhṛtaḥ duryodhanasya agratas pratyakṣam kuru bāndhavasya miṣataḥ karṇasya śalyasya ca

original: pītaṃ tasya mayādya pāṇḍavavadhūkeśāmbarākarṣiṇaḥ koṣṇaṃ jīvata eva tīkṣṇakarajakṣuṇṇādasṛgvakṣasaḥ' //
analyzed: pītam tasya mayā adya pāṇḍava vadhū keśa ambara ākarṣiṇaḥ koṣṇam jīvataḥ eva tīkṣṇa karaja kṣuṇṇāt asṛj vakṣasaḥ
atra rājñaḥ ityādau sa utprāsa tva param prasanna gambhīra pada tvam
evam
aṅgāja senāpate rāja vallabha droṇa upahāsin karṇam

original: sāṃprataṃ rakṣainaṃ bhīmād duḥśāsanam' ityādau jñeyam / @--------------------
analyzed: sāṃpratam rakṣa enam bhīmāt duḥśāsanam ityādau jñeyam
viśeṣaṇa ityādi
iha iti samāsoktyā anantaram
viśeṣaṇānām ca atra bahu tvam eva vivakṣitam

original: anyathā hyapuṣṭārthasya doṣatvābhidhānāt tannirākaraṇena svīkṛtasya puṣṭārthasyāyaṃ viṣayaḥ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā hi apuṣṭa arthasya doṣa tva abhidhānāt tad nirākaraṇena svīkṛtasya puṣṭa arthasya ayam viṣayaḥ syāt
evam evaṃvidha aneka viśeṣaṇa upanyāsa dvāreṇa vaicitrya atiśayaḥ saṃbhavati iti ālaṅkāratvam
pratīyamāna arthasya vācya unmukha tvena prādhānya abhāvāt gabhīṅkāraḥ tad antar kṛtatvam
atas eva iti pratīyamāna arthasya prādhānya abhāvāt
vācyasya eva prādhānyena nirdeśāt
gambhīra tvam pratīyamānasya api arthasya guṇībhāvena garbhīkārāt

original: yatra ca pratīyamānaṃ prati upasarjanīkṛtasvarthayoḥ śabdārthayoravasthānāṃ sa dhvaneḥ sa eva viṣayaḥ ' iti /
analyzed: yatra ca pratīyamānam prati upasarjanīkṛta svarthayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ avasthānām sa dhvaneḥ saḥ eva viṣayaḥ iti

original: atra ca na tathātvamityuktaṃ nāyaṃ dhvanerviṣaya iti /
analyzed: atra ca na tathātvam iti uktam na ayam dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ iti
atas eva nām api asya yaugikam iti āha evam ca ityādi
sa utprāsa tva param iti

original: tathā ca rājño jagad rakṣitavyamasya punaranujamātrarakṣaṇāsiddheranyadeva nāmamātreṇa rājātvamityupahāsaparatvam /
analyzed: tathā ca rājñaḥ jagat rakṣitavyam asya punar anuja mātra rakṣaṇa asiddheḥ anyat eva nāma mātreṇa
evam anyeṣām api svayam eva etat avagantavyam
ādi śabdena

original: 'yasyaikasyaiva doṣṇāṃ jayati daśaśatī sānvayo dvāri rudraḥ kārāgāre surāṇāṃ patarapi ca śacī cāmaravyagrahastā /
analyzed: yasya ekasya eva doṣṇām jayati daśaśatī sa anvayaḥ dvāri rudraḥ kārā āgāre surāṇām ca śacī cāmara vyagra hastā

original: kanyā tasyeyamekā rajanicarapatereṣa śuddhāntameko bālo niḥśaṅkamasyāḥ praviśati ca namaste 'se vaiṣṇavāya' //
analyzed: kanyā tasya iyam ekā rajanicara pateḥ eṣa śuddhāntam ekaḥ bālaḥ niḥśaṅkam asyāḥ praviśati ca namaḥ te se vaiṣṇavāya
ityādau api viśeṣaṇānām prasacca gambhīra tvam jñeyam
start sūtra
viśeṣyasya api sāmye dva paurvā upādāne śleṣaḥ
kevala viśeṣa sāmyam
viśeṣya yukta viśeṣaṇa sāmyam tu adhikṛtya idam ucyate

original: tatra dvayoḥ prākaraṇikayoraprākaraṇikayoḥ prākaraṇikāprakaraṇikayor vā śliṣṭapadopanibandhe śleṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra dvayoḥ prākaraṇikayoḥ aprākaraṇikayoḥ prākaraṇika aprakaraṇikayoḥ vā śliṣṭa pada upanibandhe śleṣaḥ

original: tatrādyaṃ prakāradvayaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyasāmya eva tṛtīyastu prakāro viśeṣaṇasāmya eva bhavati /
analyzed: tatra ādyam prakāra dvayam viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya sāmye eva tṛtīyaḥ tu prakāraḥ viśeṣaṇa sāmye eva bhavati
viśeṣya sāmye tu artha prakaraṇa ādinā vācya artha niyame rtha antara gata dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ syāt
ādye tu prakāra dvaye dvayoḥ api arthayoḥ vācya tvam
atas eva atra dvayoḥ vā upādāne iti tṛtīya prakāra viṣaya tvena uktam
viśeṣyasya api sāmye iti tu śiṣṭa prakāra dvaya viṣayam
viśeṣyasya api ityādi
idam iti śleṣa lakṣaṇam
ādyam iti
prākaraṇika gata tvena a prākaraṇika gata tvena ca
eva kāraḥ ca atra bhinnakramaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
tena prakāra dvayam eva iti vyākhyeyam

original: ataśca tṛtīyaḥ prakāro viśeṣaṇasāmya eva bhavatīti vyāvacchredaphalam /
analyzed: atas ca tṛtīyaḥ prakāraḥ viśeṣaṇa sāmye eva bhavati iti vyāvacchreda phalam

original: anyathā hi prakāradvayasyāsya viśeṣyasāmyābhāve 'pi darśanādavyātpiḥ syāt /
analyzed: anyathā hi prakāra dvayasya asya viśeṣya sāmya abhāve syāt
tat yathā saṃcāra pūtāni nigantarāṇi ityādi
atra prabhā dhenvoḥ dvayoḥ prakṛtayoḥ viśeṣyayoḥ sāmya abhāvaḥ
ā bahūta maṇḍala agra rucayaḥ saṃnaddha vakṣaḥsthalāḥ sa ūṣmāṇaḥ vraṇinaḥ vipakṣa hṛdaya pronmāthinaḥ karkaśāḥ

original: utsṛtṣṭāmbaradṛṣṭavigrahabharā yasya smarāgresarā yodhā daivavadhūstanāśca na dadhuḥ kṣobhaṃ sa vo 'vyājjinaḥ' //
analyzed: utsṛtṣṭa ambara dṛṣṭa vigraha bharāḥ yasya smara agresarāḥ yodhāḥ daiva vadhū stanāḥ ca na kṣobham sa vaḥ
atra stana yodhayoḥ aprakṛtayoḥ viśeṣyayoḥ sāmya abhāvaḥ
viśeṣaṇa sāmye eva iti na punar viśeṣya sāmye

original: etadapi viśeṣyasāmye kiṃ na bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha-viśeṣyasāmye tvityādi /
analyzed: etat api viśeṣya sāmye kim na bhavati iti āśaṅkya āha viśeṣya sāmye tu ityādi
yathā
laṅkā laāṇam puttaa vasaṃta māsammi laddha pasarāṇam
āpīa lohiāṇam vīhei jaṇaḥ palāsaṇam
laṅkā ālayānām putraka
vasanta māse labdha prasarāṇām
āpīta lohitānām bibheti janaḥ palāśānām
atra palāśānām iti viśeṣyasya api śliṣṭa tvam
prakaraṇa vaśāt ca vṛkṣa viśeṣaṇam eva vācya tva niyamāt prastuta tvena niśācarāṇām aprastutānām vyaṅgya tvam

original: atra copamāyā eva vyaṅgyatvaṃ yuktaṃ nātiśayokteriti prakṛtānupayogādiha noktam /
analyzed: atra ca upamāyāḥ eva vyaṅgya tvam yuktam na atiśayokteḥ iti prakṛta anupayogāt iha nā uktam

original: nanu ca yathaivāyaṃ dhvanirviṣayastathaivādyamapi bhedadvayaṃ kiṃ na bhavatītyāśaṅkyāha-ādya ityādi /
analyzed: nanu ca yathā eva ayam dhvaniḥ viṣayaḥ tathā eva ādyam api bheda dvayam kim na bhavati iti āśaṅkya āha ādyaḥ ityādi
vācya tvam iti
atas eva na dhvaneḥ viṣayaḥ
tasya vācya atirikta nva rūpa tvāt
tṛtīya prakāra viṣaya tvena iti prādhānyāt uktam
ādyasya api prakāra dvayasya dvayoḥ upādāna saṃbhavāt
krameṇa yathā

original: 'yena dhvastamanobhavena balijitkāyaḥ purāstrīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayo gaṅgā ca yo 'dhārayat /
analyzed: yena dhvasta manobhavena bali jit kāyaḥ purā astrīkṛtaḥ yaḥ ca udvṛtta bhujaṅga hāra valayaḥ gaṅgā ca yaḥ dhārayat

original: yasyāhuḥ śaśimacchirohara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyātsa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ' //
analyzed: yasya āhuḥ śaśimat śiraḥ haraḥ iti stutyam ca nāma amarāḥ pāyāt sa svayam andhaka kṣaya karaḥ tvām sarvadā mādhavaḥ
nītānām ākulībhāvam lubdhaiḥ bhuri śilīmukhaiḥ
sadṛśe vana vṛddhānām kamalānām tad īkṣaṇe

original: 'svecchopajātaviṣayo 'pi na yāti vaktuṃ dehīti mārgaṇaśataiśca dadāti duḥkham /
analyzed: sva icchā upajāta viṣayaḥ na yāti vaktum dehi iti mārgaṇa śataiḥ ca dadāti duḥkham
mohāt samākṣipati jīvitam api akāṇḍe kaṣṭam manobhavaḥ iva īśvara durvidagdhaḥ
atra hari harayoḥ ddhayoḥ api prākaraṇika tvam
padmānām mṛgāṇām ca upamāna tvāt a prākaraṇika tvarm
iśvara manobhavayoḥ prākaraṇika a prākaraṇika tvam
evam ca śabda artha ubhaya gata tvena vartamāna tvāt trividhaḥ
tatra udātta ādi svara bhedāt prayanta bhedāt ca śabda anya tve śabda śleṣaḥ
yatra prāyeṇa pada bhaṅgaḥ bhavati
artha śleṣaḥ tu yatra svara ādi bhedaḥ na asti
atas eva na tatra sabhaṅga pada tvam
saṃkalanayā tu ubhaya śleṣaḥ
yathā
raktacchada tvam vikacāḥ vahantaḥ na alam jalaiḥ saṃgatam ādadhānāḥ

original: nirasya puṣpeṣu ruciṃ samagrāṃ padmā virejuḥ śramaṇā yathaiva' //
analyzed: nirasya puṣpeṣu rucim samagrām padmāḥ virejuḥ śramaṇāḥ yathā eva
atra raktacchada tvam ityādau artha śleṣaḥ
na alam ityādau śabda śleṣaḥ
ubhaya ghaṭanāyām ubhaya śleṣaḥ
grantha gaurava bhayāt tu pṛthak na udāhṛtam
